data.description:
We are looking for Database Administrator to join our technology team.

The Role 
·      Maintain the health and performance of all databases running in a virtual environments
·      Handle connectivity, access control, high availability, replication, storage, patching and upgrades for all data systems.
·      Deep performance tuning covering database internals on index, statistics, query plan optimization, locking, wait interfaces, use of DMVs for diagnostics and driving improvements,
·      Develop reports for performance and capacity reviews.
·      Analyze and troubleshoot problems with the database, network, storage, servers and underlying VMware hosts.
·      Installs new software releases, system upgrades, evaluates and installs OS patches and resolves software related issues.

Desired Experiences & Skills
·      Significant practical hands-on experience with database administration, backup and recovery, performance tuning and high-availability solutions.
·      Detailed understanding of Postgres database server architecture, concepts, features, and high-availability technologies.
·      Expert knowledge of PL/PgSQL, triggers, and stored procedure development and optimization in PostgreSQL
·      Experience with technologies like RabbitMQ and ElasticSearch
·      Exceptional problem-solving skills.
·      Audit existing Database configuration and setup
·      Knowledge of Linux platforms (Ubuntu/Debian preferred)
·      Passionate about learning new technologies
Bonus
  • Working knowledge about NoSQL databases (Redis, Cassandra, MongoDB etc)
  • Python scripting Knowledge
  • Good understanding of Public Cloud services
Location: Maslak / Istanbul
Please contact aylin.aydogan@zingat.com / @AylinAydogan
Who we are?
REIDIN is the world's FIRST leading real estate information company that is designed to help Real Estate market professionals who are interested in the emerging countries. 
REIDIN’s unique information services are powered by an unrivalled depth of local knowledge and partnerships managed through teams in Istanbul and Dubai.
 
What we do? 
REIDIN helps professionals and individuals easily access the real estate information they need to make more informed investment, purchase, sales, rent, mortgage, finance, development and management decisions.
 
How we do?
For us a great team is the key for the success. We do our business with a great team members who are highly passionate, and committed to our long-term strategy and objectives.

We are looking for an enthusiastic ASP.NET Web developer for our Netsparker Enterprise development team who can work in a highly collaborative environment, is logical and systematic in his work and can work on his own initiative. 

Brief Job Description

  • Responsible for developing new features in collaboration with our product management and security research teams
  • Coordinate with our production, security, and support teams to keep our products robust
  • Participate in code reviews, and make technical contributions to product architecture 

Essential Skills Required

  • 3+ years of proven ASP.NET MVC application development experience
  • Advanced knowledge on the HTTP protocol
  • Hands-on experience using the Windows and Linux operating systems
  • Maintainable JavaScript development
  • Proficient web application security knowledge
  • Preferably having knowledge about Unit Testing

Big Plus

  • Previous involvement in open source projects
  • Published a public working ASP.NET MVC application
  • Experience in UI Design/UX/Usability
  • Personal Skills Required
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills in English
  • Proactive, self-motivated and goal-oriented
  • Strong in teamwork and collaboration
  • Familiarity with the following concepts: RTFM, DRY, GTD, TDD, JFGI

Benefits

  • Best hardware and software
  • Competitive salary
  • Continuous learning and development opportunity through qualified technical resources
  • Global technical conference attendance opportunities
  • Generous time-off policy
  • Flexible working hours

Additional Information:

Please add one sample class/code/source code of an application (you can point us to a public source code repository as well). Choose the best one, impress us!

If you have experience in Windows Desktop Development, please consider applying to .NET Software Developer (Desktop/Core) position to join the development team of Netsparker Desktop/Core.

We are looking for enthusiastic .NET Developer for our Netsparker Desktop development team who can work in a highly collaborative environment, is logical and systematic in his work and can work on his own initiative.

Benefits

Additional Information:

Please add one sample class/code/source code of an application (you can point us to a public source code repository as well). Choose the best one, impress us!

Job Description:
We are serving to thousands of Real Estate Professionals all around Turkey, making their lives easier with unique experiences. It’s now our time disrupt PropTech scene in Europe.
We are looking for a skilled Backend(Laravel) Developer to join our Tech Team at Metropol Istanbul, Ataşehir, Istanbul.
For all your inquiries and applications, use jobs@makswin.com

What you will do:
·      Create efficient, testable, and reusable PHP modules, including responsibility for clean and reusable code
·      Design software architecture for our different platforms
·      Build internal & external RESTful API

What you will bring:
·      Very good & MVP-focused coding skills in PHP of minimum 4 years
·      Recent production grade experience with Laravel 5
·      Solid technical understanding of RESTful API’s
·      Previous experience with handling & querying relational databases (e.g. , MariaDB or PostgreSQL)
·      Passionate about writing well-structured, efficient and maintainable code, actively keeping the quality of the code base in check
·      You have good understanding of security, testing(PHPUnit), monitoring, building and supporting of applications.
·      Passion for “clean code” and quality standards, like SOLID principles and design patterns

Benefits:
·      Free fruits & drinks all the time
·      Free Gym at the building
·      Colleagues striving for excellence while using the latest Technologies
·      Flat hierarchy
·      MacBook is the standard
·      Health care plan
·      A positive environment where we are not just colleagues but teammates and friends
·      Great work-life balance

• Digital ajanslarda en az 2 yıl çalışmış,

• HTML5, XHTML, CSS 3.0, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap konularına hakim,

• Adobe Photoshop, grid sistemi, mobil arayüz tasarımından anlayan,

• PHP'yi frontend'e bağlayabilecek, temel PHP fonksiyonlarına hakim,

• Responsive tasarım ve Cross-browser uyumluluğu konularında deneyimli,

• Sektörde tecrübeli insanlardan beslenip kendini geliştirmek isteyen,

. Yazılım dünyasındaki her türlü yenilik, teknoloji, araç, dil ve sistemlerini takip eden,

. İyi derecede HTML, CSS ve Javascript bilgisine sahip,

. jQuery kütüphanesine hakim,

. Her şeyi plug-in’ler ile çözmeye kalkışmayan kendi de yazabilen,

. Semantik ve modüler kod yazmaya dikkat eden,

. Responsive arayüz geliştirme konusunda bilgi sahibi,

. Cross-Browser konusunda sorun yaşamayan,

. Analitik düşünen, çözüm odaklı olabilen.

• Ayağının tozuyla hızlı bir başlangıç yapacak Frontend Developer arıyoruz.

About Arfitect

Arfitect began operations in 2017 to create software solutions with cutting-edge technologies for enterprise companies all around the world. The prospective team will work with highly experienced professionals on software projects with various new challenges and exciting opportunities.

Arfitect particularly focuses on maintaining a "great to be part of" for its workspace and appreciates the value of talent and hard work. The prospective members of our team will enjoy a jubilant work environment where their work is valued, and a long-term career path is considered.

 

Essential Duties

·        Design and develop enterprise and mission-critical software applications to code complex applications with high quality and within a reasonable timeframe

·        Provide training/knowledge transfer to other IT staff on applications developed or enhanced

·        Design, build and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code

·        Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization

·        Design and implement low-latency, high-availability, and performant APIs.

·        Establish, troubleshoot and manage core application integrations with external systems

·        Participate as necessary in the development of test cases, test scenarios, and test plans to support business requirements

Requirements

·        5+ years of demonstrated experience in all areas of the Software Development Life Cycle

·        Hands-on professional development experience with C# language, .NET Framework, and .NET Core

·        Experience in web development, including ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Web Forms, Web Services, and Web API

·        Experience with Entity Framework Code First Approach, Log4Net, Redis, Bootstrap

·        Strong knowledge in front-end technologies JavaScript, JQuery, HTML/HTML5 and CSS

·        Experience designing and building consistent, reliable, performant RESTful services

·        Strong understanding of object-oriented programming

·        Experience with relational database design and development (SQL, T-SQL)

·        Flexibility of providing support during odd hours, weekends, and peak seasons

·        Ability to work in a decentralized team and communicate using virtual communications tools (phone, conferencing, web meetings)

·        Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively and be a self-starter; takes actions to achieve goals; proactive

·        Verbal and written communication skills in English

Nice To Have

·        TDD experience

·        DevOps, CI/CD experience

·        Experience with cloud technologies (Azure/AWS) is a plus

·        Experience with Azure, Application Insights, API management, Cosmos DB, and Service Bus is a plus

·        Experience using team collaboration tools/source control programs, preferably Team Foundation Server (TFS) and GIT

·        Knowledge of agile methodologies (Scrum)

·        Angular, React experience

·        Linux experience is a plus

 

Education:

Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or other related field from four-year College or University.

Minimum 2 yıl tecrübeli,

.NET, C#, MVC, WebAPI alt yapısı ile proje geliştirmiş ve deneyim kazanmış,

Web tabanlı proje geliştirmiş, javascript jquery bilgisi olan,

Database yapılarına hakim, Entity Framework ile proje geliştirmiş,

Yeni teknolojilere açık, öğrenmeye ve kendini geliştirmeye hevesli,

Gereksinimler

• 4+ yıl PHP programcılığı yapmış olan,
• Linux sistem bilgisine sahip olmak,
• Teknik seviye konuşma ve anlama düzeyinde İngilizce bilen,

Kullandığımız Teknolojiler

• PHP 7,
• Nginx
• Symfony,

• ReactJS,
• VueJS,

Story of Viravira.co began in 2016 as an idea to make boats accessible to a larger audience and disrupt an industry that is known to be luxurious with the power of the internet. Today, we serve globally in 41 countries and 900 locations with more than 11,000 yachts. Viravira is based in Istanbul and is the largest yacht charter platform in the country.

Oceans are what links this world together, and we believe in a travel industry where boat holidays are commonplace. Join our team and help us bring boats and oceans to the people.

We are looking for a Senior Full Stack Developer that will develop the backend and improve the front end. As a Senior Full Stack Developer, you will lead a team and cooperate with product owner to translate a business need into a robust and integrated technology solution. You will be solving unique and challenging software problems and develop innovative solutions.


What you'll be doing


  • Develop front end website architecture
  • Design user interactions on web pages
  • Develop back end website applications
  • Create servers and databases for functionality
  • Ensure responsiveness of applications


Requirements


  • Minimum 3 years of working experience

  • Understanding of network stack such as sockets, HTTP
  • Understanding the nature of asynchronous programming
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git
  • Knowledge of GNU/Linux operating system
  • Working experience with Docker, Redis, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
  • Understanding the design principles behind a scalable application and microservices architecture
  • Implementing automated testing platforms and unit tests
  • Proficiency in English
  • React Native knowledge is a plus


Benefits


  • Salary and bonus scheme
  • Employee stock ownership plan
  • Education Programme
  • An exciting environment to support growth and personal development
  • Occasional yacht trips
  • No-dress code
  • We also offer many hard and soft skills training to help you improve and challenge yourself. You'll have access to Udemy where you can choose over 10,000 courses to satisfy your hunger for knowledge

You will be part of the software development team in our Ankara office at Maidan, you will be responsible of software development and maintenance processes of a web application being developed for one of our customers.


 

Responsibilities

  • Writing clean, high-quality, high-performance, maintainable code
  • Develop and support software including applications, database integration, interfaces, and new functionality enhancements
  • Coordinate cross-functionally to insure project meets business objectives and compliance standards
  • Support test and deployment of new products and features
  • Participate in code reviews


Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science (or related field)
  • Knowledge of ASP.NET, .NET Core, C#, MVC, Windows Service Applications and SQL, Telerik Kendo is required, 
  • 4+ years of relevant work experience
  • Expertise in Object Oriented Design, Database Design, and XML Schema
  • Experience with Agile or Scrum software development methodologies
  • Ability to multi-task, organize, and prioritize work

Firmamızın İzmir ofisinde yazılım ekibimize dahil edeceğimiz;

  • React.js
  • .NET Core
  • PostgreSQL

- Analytics web analiz ve ölçüm araçlarına hakim, Adwords çalışmalarının dokümantasyonunu yapacak ve yöneticiye rapor sunacak, gerekli olması halinde porföyündeki Adwords çalışmalarından örnekler gösterebilecek, 
- Birden fazla projeyi aynı anda yürütebilecek, motivasyonu yüksek, kampanyalara ve pazarlama ekibinin diger kreatif çalışma ve projelerine fikirleriyle destek verebilecek.
- Müşteri ilişkileri kuvvetli, takım çalışmasına ve esnek çalışma saatlerine yatkın tercihen ingilizce bilen, Adwords Uzmanı bir takım arkadaşı aramaktayız.

PHP Backend Developer


We're building a checklist enforcement app system for businesses.

The app is currently in closed beta stage and is in active use with

premises in the United Kingdom.


This is a remote position. This position will require you to

communicate over video calls with the team which is distributed

around the world. The core hours are during the BST


What do we expect:

  • Self disciplined
  • Strong time management skills
  • Ability to communicate in written and spoken English
  • Be open and embrace change
  • Be product focused


What do we offer:

  • Highly skilled and motivated team members
  • Extremely flexible work schedule. Define your own
  • Salary paid in GBP
  • No legacy code


Technical requirements:

  • Strong PHP knowledge
  • Strong understanding of SOLID Principles
  • Understanding of TDD
  • Understanding of testing and its benefits
  • Understanding of VCS
  • Understanding of REST APIs


Plus points:

  • Experience with REST Frameworks in PHP (Slim, Symfony)
  • PhpSpec
  • Behat


Day to day responsebilities:

You'll be working on the backend API that powers our product.

The features the team is working will be agreed upon in three amigo

meetings and then put into executable specs - as gherkin files.


The teams responsibility is to convert these specifications into

working code.


We're working with PhpSpec and Behat and expect the person willing

to join our team to do the same. We aim to keep our code coverage

high. We want our code to remain highly maintainable.


It is a plus point if you've worked with PhpSpec and Behat before

however you can research, learn and do the example as well.


How to apply?

Please create a simple user registration system using PhpSpec and Behat.


Applications without the example will be disregarded.


Things to do:

  • Do a sample example mapping session on your own
  • Create executable specifications with the acceptance criteria in Gherkin
  • Execute them with Behat
  • Design the objects using PhpSpec


Send your example along with your application to yi@hubbit.co.uk


Notes:

Salary will be paid in GBP and is based on your experience level.

Your experience which will be assesed and you will be assigned to

a payment level based on that.


The levels are open throughout the company. At any point, you are

able to request a re-assesment and may change your level.


At the end of the first month, your assesment will be finalised.

This might result in a termination, downgrade of the level or

an upgrade of the level.


The evaluation will be made as a team decision. Things like team

work, general work attitude and motivation will be factored into

this decision.

The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and debugging responsive web and mobile applications for the company. Using React.js, Redux, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, this candidate will be able to translate user and business needs into functional frontend design.

Responsibilities
  • Designing, developing, and testing UI for mobile and web applications

Qualifications
  • Bachelor’s degree or equivalent in Computer Science

  • Experience building object-oriented web applications in JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3
  • Good communication skills and must have English

Nice to have
  • Backend knowledge will be a plus (Node.js, Java)
  • Native mobile development experiences (Swift, Java, Kotlin) or React Native experiences

Perks
  • Sodexo
  • Public Transportation fees
  • Work with a highly skilled team
  • Top-notch technical stack & tools

GENEL NİTELİKLER

Ekip arkadaşları aranmaktadır.

Firmamız web sitesinin geliştirme ve güncelleme süreçlerine aktif olarak katılacak,

Firma içi ihtiyaçlara yönelik yazılım geliştirecek,

Kocaeli'de bulunan merkez ofisimizde tam zamanlı olarak ailemize dahil olacaktır.

Çalışma Şartları
* Konum: Bakırköy, İstanbul.

Firmamız Hakkında

* https://volosoft.com/ adresinden ürünlerimizi görebilirsiniz.

Digitastic GmbH Bilgisayar Yazılım Donanım

Digitastic GmbH sirketi olarak Berlin’de faaliyet gosteren bir yazilim firmasiyiz ve 2014 yilindan Almanya’daki muhasebe firmalarina cözüm ortakligini yapiyoruz.


2014 yilindan günümüze kadar belge yönetim sistemleri, android tabanli belge tarama cihazlarinin gelistirilmesi, Mobil uygulamalar ve arka planda calisan bircok yazilim ile müsterilerimizin ve muhasebecilerin calismalarina destek olmaya, onlarin is yüklerini hafifletmeye devam ediyoruz. 


Geldigimiz noktada müsterilerimize daha iyi hizmet vermek ve onlara yeni cözümler sunmak amaciyla bilisim ekibimizi genisletmeyi dusunuyoruz. Bu kapsamda İzmir-Bornova şubemizde, yeniliklere acik, ögrenme istegi olan, analitik dusunebilen ve en önemlisi her görevi titizlikle tamamlayacak arkadaslari yanimizda görmekten mutluluk duyacagiz.

Fabrika Medya ekibi olarak 2010 yılından bu yana web uygulamaları ve mobil uygulamalar geliştirmekteyiz. 

Front-end ekibimiz için aşağıda belirtilen niteliklere sahip dinamik profesyoneller arıyoruz;

  • Arayüz geliştirme konusunda en az 2 yıl deneyimli

  • İyi derecede responsive ve mobil geliştirme yapabilen,
  • Tercihen React ve/veya React Native ile proje geliştirmiş,
  • Akıllı telefonlar ve tabletler dahil olmak üzere birden fazla cihaz, platform ve tarayıcı için geliştirme ve test yapabilen,

  • Takım çalışmasına yatkın ve sorumluluk sahibi,
  • Git üzerinde kendi yazdığı React kodları referans olarak sunabilecek,
  • Erkek adaylar için askerliğini yapmış veya en az 2 yıl tecilli olan.


İş Tanımı:

Sektörlerinde lider şirketler ve kamu kurumları için özel olarak geliştirdiğimiz projelerin yapımı ve sürdürülmesinde görev almak.

Üretim sürecimizde;

  • Web uygulamalarını PWA teknolojileri ve REST API bağlantısı ile geliştiriyoruz.
  • Geliştirdiğimiz web uygulamalarında React ve Redux kullanıyoruz.
  • Mobil uygulama projelerini React Native ile geliştiriyoruz.
  • Front-end, tasarım, back-end ve DevOps süreçlerini ayrı ekipler ile yürütüyoruz.

Genel Nitelikler


●     Benzer pozisyonda en az iki yıllık tecrübe sahibi,

●     PHP dilinde uzmanlaşmış, Laravel Framework ile çalışmış,

●     HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, konularında tecrübe sahibi,

●     Vue.js, veya React gibi teknolojilerden en az birinde tecrübe sahibi,

●     İyi derecede git kullanan, Github/Gitlab’a ara yüzüne, araçlarına hakim,

●     GO programlama dili öğrenmek ve bu konuda kendini geliştirmek isteyen,

●     Ekip çalışmasına yatkın, araştırmayı seven, dijital trendleri yakından takip eden,

●     Planlı, disiplinli çalışma yetisine, titiz ve dikkatli adaylar.


Tercih Sebebi Özellikler


●     GO Programlama dili konusunda bilgi sahibi,

●     Mikroservis mimarileri ve REST API’ler hakkında tecrübe sahibi,

●     MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite veri tabanlarının herhangi birinde tecrübe sahibi,

●     En kolay yoldan değil, en verimli yoldan kodlama yapabilen,

●     Temel SSH komutları konusunda bilgili,

●     Linux sunucularda konsol üzerinden yönetim sağlayabilen,

●     Profesyonel seviyede Google kullanabilen, problem çözme kabiliyetine sahip,

●     Kendini geliştirmeyi seven, buna vakit ayıran, kolay öğrenen,

●     Tercihen en az 2 yıldan uzun bir süredir Denizli’de ikamet eden yada Pamukkale Üniversitesinde halen eğitim görmekte olanlar.


İşin Tanımı


●   Çoğunlukla GO ve PHP kullanılan projelerimizin geliştirme sürecinde çalışmak,

●   Şirket içinde bulunan diğer birimlerden geri bildirim/hata toplamak,

●   Araştırma yapmak, bilgi toplamak, proje ve görev takibi yapmak,

●   Ürün geliştirme ve iş geliştirme ekibine iş ile ilgili geri bildirimlerde bulunmak,

●   Şirketimizde iş hayatı boyunca sürekli eğitime tabi tutulacağının farkında olmak.

●   Esnek çalışma koşulları sunan şirketimiz 7/24 açık olup, haftalık çalışma 5 gündür.

●   Mikroservis mimarisinin daha yoğun kullanıldığı şirketimizde Front-End işleri çok azdır. Yoğunlukla Back-end çalışılmaktadır.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Engineering or related disciplines
  • 7+ years of experience as a software developer with below technologies:
  • C#, Asp.Net Core, MVC, Web services (Web API)
  • JavaScript, JQuery, AngularJS/React.js
  • Strong knowledge of Design Patterns

  • Experience with Redis, Elasticsearch, MongoDB

ViaDirect is a French brand launched 10 years ago; we are today specialized in kiosk-based wayfinding solutions that help shoppers and visitors to find their way in public and private places. Expert and market leader, ViaDirect has been ranked in 2017 by the Financial Times as one of the fastest growing companies in Europe. 

Since two years, ViaDirect is also developing a digital signage solution for meeting rooms and conference centres allowing to know information about the use of workspaces or buildings from the reception, landings, relaxing spaces, and especially the rooms entrances.
We are recruiting an Fullstack developer to expand our developers team on this project.

ViaDirect has a great company culture based on the startup spirit, and offers at the same time the benefits of a mature market player (stable growth and a strong brand image on a value-added nich market).

++ BAŞVURUNUZU MAIL OLARAK YAPINIZ.

We are the fastest growing, gift-based eCommerce and data platform today. Our understanding of gift-based customer success applications began with learning intentions and psychology around how people gift. With our suite of P2P and B2C customer acquisition, engagement, retention and reactivation products, we help leading brands lower the cost of customer acquisition, and increase purchase frequency and customer lifetime value. SmartGift is based in New York with its main engineering and development office in Istanbul. Learn more at smartgiftit.com.


We are looking for a recent college grad or early-career QA/Business Analyst to join our exciting, driven and talented team. Hard work and developing jointly as a team is key to our success. The emphasis of the open position is on defining, improving, and executing the technology development processes and operations. The QA/Business Analyst will be in charge of ensuring that the technology and software products that we develop serve our platform partners and shoppers’ needs and requirements. The role is a combination of business analysis and quality assurance leadership. The selected candidate will join the production team with a focus on designing and implementing a winning approach to integrated product design, development, quality assurance, and testing.


● Develop the quality strategy: You will work with leadership to understand our development roadmap and current operations in order to formulate a strategy for achieving the necessary level of uncompromisingly high-quality standards

● Monitor, refine, and automate the quality strategy: You will monitor for quality problems and work to fix the process. Where possible, you will automate processes and testing

● Help identify likely quality problems proactively: You will analyze specific requirements, identifying gaps, as well as participate in story creation to ensure that acceptance criteria are sufficiently clear and well documented

● Validate features and usability: You will coordinate, manage, and perform all testing efforts and associated documentation

● Measure and analyze product usage: You will analyze data coming from various analytics platforms to determine what features are successful and help prioritize our roadmap

● Participate in product design: You will suggest new features, product improvements, and identify usability challenges



● Strong English is written and spoken communication skills in an international team structure—your teammates will come from many different parts of the world

● Experience with reviewing the usability of web applications

● Ability to work with senior management and leadership and speak up when necessary

● Quick learner with a passion for start-ups, technology, and product development

● Experience working with data collection, management and analysis

● Experience with software development environments

● Experience with documenting and troubleshooting software defects Bonus Points

● BS in Computer Science or Industrial Engineering

● Experience with bug-tracking, configuration management, and quality/test management tools



We offer the opportunity to become part of an exciting, driven, talented team working on an exciting technology environment. Growth and career opportunities are unlimited. We also offer good pay depending on the candidate’s qualifications. In addition, we have a great office environment that’s conducive to high-powered work and comes with unlimited tea, coffee, snacks, and fruit.



$1,300-$1,600 per month starting pay depending on qualifications




If you feel you fit this description and are excited about the opportunity, contact Orhan KUTLU at orhan@smartgift.it.

Başarı hikayemizi yazarken bizimle birlikte bu hikayede yer alacak bize değer ve tecrübe katacak takım arkadaşları arıyoruz.

* Başkalarının yazdığı kodları da gözden geçirebilmesi ve görüş belirtebilmesi

Meet Insider, the first integrated Growth Management Platform (GMP).

Insider Growth Management Platform (GMP) helps digital marketers drive growth across the funnel, from Acquisition to Activation, Retention, and Revenue. Leveraging real-time predictive segmentation powered by deep Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning capabilities, Growth Management Platform empowers marketers to deliver personalized journeys across the web, mobile web, mobile apps, and ad channels. Built on a unified data layer, GMP is easy to implement and simple to use, avoiding the need for complex integrations and dependency on IT teams. Insider simplifies the life of digital marketers and helps them drive growth for their brands, with zero marketing waste.

Insider is a technology company with offices in London, Singapore, Tokyo, Hong Kong, Seoul, Sydney, Helsinki, Barcelona, Dubai, Moscow, Warsaw, Taipei, Jakarta, Istanbul, Kiev, Ho Chi Minh City, Bangkok, Ankara and Kuala Lumpur. Insider was listed as one of Europe’s 100 Hottest Startups by WIRED Magazine and won Red Herring Top 100 Europe in 2017. CrunchBase has recently ranked Insider’s co-founder and CEO Hande Cilingir as one of the top three women CEOs outside of the US.

Some of the most prestigious Fortune 500 companies and top brands in retail, automotive and travel across the globe use Insider to deliver AI-backed personalized experiences. Helping world’s leading brands grow beyond the speed of customer expectations, Insider is trusted by over 400 businesses across various industries including UNIQLO, Singapore Airlines, Tokopedia, Virgin, New Balance, Nissan, Huawei, Samsung, Puma, Newsweek, Media Markt, AVIS, Allianz, BBVA, Dominos, McDonald’s, Avon and CNN.

Our engineers and developers are constantly harnessing the full force of the digital world to make a great impact, nurturing their work with innovation and shipping like artists to create beautiful and smart products. The product development and the technical team is located in Istanbul. Currently, we are running 120+ servers on an average, 75 Million requests, and sending 200 Million push notifications per day. In predictive we have accomplished to capture more than 50TB of historical data. We also successfully reached 25% of the global population.

Requirements:
  • 3+ years experience as a Front-end Developer;
  • Experience with HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Vuejs;
  • Experience with modern Front End Dev Ops (NPM, WebPack, Gulp, Babel, etc);
  • Experience with Sass or other compiled CSS languages;
  • Experience in responsive web design;
  • Develop and test across multiple browsers, platforms, and devices, including smartphones and tablets;
  • Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them;
  • Stay up-to-date on emerging technologies;
  • Good knowledge of version control systems e.g. Git;
  • Experience in optimizing for page performance;
  • Ability to write clean and semantical front-end code;
  • Should be good at teamwork and taking responsibility;
  • Should be open for learning, developing and learning new technologies.
Responsibilities;
  • Passionate about user experience;
  • Collaborate with back-end developers and web designers to improve usability;
  • Developing and maintaining our website and web applications;
  • Coordinating with co-developers and other related departments.
Our Engineering Culture;
  • Our team believes collaboration and fast iteration.
  • We work in small agile groups to solve sophisticated and high impact problems.
  • We work closely with other engineer teams and don’t afraid to get our hands dirty with other areas if needed.
  • We don’t wait for jobs, we create them. Because in a startup, nothing happens by itself. Not unless we make it.

What is it like to work at Insider?

We are underdogs, game changers, data-junkies, and outsiders. Coding is the heart of what we do but we acknowledge that codes die, codes break, codes evolve. What’s permanent is our engineering mind. Insider Engineers Team is where you can find the best tech minds in the industry fostering in what they are naturally good at, pushing each other’s limits to build disruptive technologies. We overcome challenges through hard work and innovation. You will work with some of the world’s most brilliant, passionate and dedicated people together to solve challenging problems.

Tarfin is looking for passionate Full-Stack PHP Developer to be part of its development team in Beyoğlu, Istanbul.

At Tarfin, in addition to a competitive salary and lots of benefits you’ll be working on cutting-edge technologies, be exposed to best mentors and reputable Venture Capital firms both in Turkey and overseas.

Why Tarfin?

Tarfin is Turkey’s leading digital platform providing farmers with high-quality agri-inputs with competitive credit terms. Our mission is to use proprietary cutting-edge technologies, our extensive funding reach and big data analytics to reduce costs of fertilizers, feed and other farm inputs for farmers in Turkey and abroad.

Tarfin is the most innovative company in its space: We are the first non-financial company to issue asset-backed security in Turkey, the first digital platform to focus on providing instant credit terms to farmers, first fintech company to partner with Turkey’s Credit Bureau for data sharing in agriculture. Tarfin is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. We are backed by region’s leading venture capital funds Collective Spark, Wamda Capital and BIC Angels.

How Do We Work?

Tarfin engineering team is developing its projects on separate layers using a docker containerized structure. The backend is on Laravel (6.0), PHP 7.3 (API) and the frontend is developed on Vue.js. We’re using Gitlab CI/CD tools while deploying to AWS (EKS, EC2).

We enjoy a strong team culture and support open source development.

We have a very enjoyable office featuring awe-inspiring Bosphorus views.

Requirements:

  • 3+ years of experience as a back-end developer
  • Understanding of MVC Architecture, OOP (Object Oriented Programming), Clean Coding principles, and RESTful services
  • Experience of PHP and PHP frameworks like Laravel, Symfony
  • Knowledge of MYSQL, Redis, etc.
  • Knowledge of Git and DevOps Concepts (CI/CD)
  • Knowledge of PHPUnit
  • Knowledge of Javascript and proficient around Vue.js, React.js
  • Analytical thinking, the ability for problem-solving and be open to learning new technologies
  • TDD (Test Driven Development)


Preferred but not required:

  • Experience with AWS and Docker
  • Knowledge of Elasticsearch, RabbitMQ, SQS
  • Knowledge of HTML5, CSS3


Benefits:

  • Competitive salary
  • Private health
  • Budget for continuing education
  • Meal card

Başladığı işi sonuçlandırabilen, yeniliklere açık, öğrenmeye hevesli, yaratıcı, sorunlara değil çözümlere odaklanan, ürettiği eserlerden bizim gibi keyif alan, en önemlisi beraber keyifle çalışabileceğimiz ekip arkadaşları arıyoruz. 

Burası bir ajans değil dolayısıyla her ay farklı bir projenin telaşına girmeyeceksiniz, piyangodan kaprisli müşteri çıkmayacak, tam konsantre olmuşken 3 ay önce teslim ettiğiniz projenin bakım sorunları ile uğraşmayacaksınız. Burası büyük ve hantal bir kurumsal (!) firma değil dolayısıyla kocaman bir ekibin arasında kaybolmayacak, enteresan ara yöneticilerle boğuşmayacak, uzun verimsiz toplantılara saatlerinizi teslim etmeyeceksiniz.

Onun yerine ilk senesinde sektöründeki tüm rakiplerini sallayan, ses getiren, hızla yükselen bir startup'ta en yenilikçi teknolojileri kullanarak, en modern proje yönetim metodları ile global projelerle yarışacak kalitede bir ürün yaratmaya koşacaksınız. 

En az teknik dokümanları anlayabilecek düzeyde ingilizce biliyor olmanızı bekliyoruz. Teknoloji yığınımız pek zayıf sayılmaz o yüzden en az 5 yıl tecrübeye sahip olmanız ya da rüştünüzü ispat etmeniz gerekli. git tecrübesi şart, çok iyi düzeyde PHP bilginizin ve VueJS / Angular / React javascript iskeletlerinden en az biri ile tecrübenizin olması gerekli.

Önem sırasına göre Symfony 4, Doctrine, Elasticsearch, webpack, Typescript, PHPUnit, PHPSpec, redis, SCSS, ubuntu, docker, AWS, react native, laravel, supervisor tecrübesi ise bu pozisyonu kapmakta size avantaj sağlayacaktır.

Not: Rakiplerinize fark atmak mı istiyorsunuz? Parçası olduğunuz açık kaynaklı projenizden bize bahsedin, github, stackoverflow vb profillerinizi cv'nize ekleyin...

data.description:
Related Digital is the leading omnichannel campaign management solution provider; offering a wide-range of best-in-class digital marketing technologies and services for many of the world’s leading brands. Related Digital was originally founded in 2002 as an email marketing provider and has evolved to provide an easy-to-use, integrated data-driven marketing automation platform called Related Marketing Cloud (RMC).

We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.

Requirements:

  • 5+ years hands on Front End Development experience
  • Knowledge on Restful Architecture and Web API.
  • Microservice knowledge is a big plus.
  • Knowledge on Html, CSS and JavaScript
  • Knowledge on web development technologies (React, Angular, Vue, jQuery etc.)
  • Knowledge about developing single page applications.
  • Knowledge about async programming is required
  • Experience over third party service and plugins development is a big plus (CkEditor, Google Tag Manager etc.)
  • Knowledge on GIT and GIT Workflows
  • Building large-scale web applications and working with distributed systems experience
  • Extreme Programming techniques is a big plus. (Pair programming etc.)
  • Ability to conduct and participate in peer code reviews
  • Good command of written and spoken English.
  • Being an Agile minded team player, having good communication skills.
  • Experienced in software development life cycle and agile principles (Especially SCRUM Framework)

company.name: Beymen Perakende ve Tekstil Yatırımları A.Ş.

data.description:
KivaCRM is a cloud business intelligence application that can be customized on demand using our embedded low-code development tools. It has various business solutions such as CRM, Call Center, Marketing, Field Sales Automation, Work Flows, Analytics and so on. 


What we are looking for: 

We are looking for a mid-level devops engineer who will help us build a better enterprise application development and management ecosystem. Below is a summary of requirements; however, note that we do not expect you to be an expert of each. We expect you to have some experience or knowledge, be enthusiastic and keep learning. 

  • Bachelor’s degree in computer related studies 
  • At least 2 years of experience as a devops engineer, with some experience in CI / CD, infrastructure automation, process development and monitoring. 
  • Intermediate knowledge of at least one scripting language (python, ruby, go*, php*, nodejs*) 
  • Operational knowledge of managing linux servers 
  • Operational knowledge of common network principles, virtual private networks, firewalls and security 
  • Experience in monitoring tools (preferably Zabbix) 
  • Experience in version control and repo management using git 
  • Experience in configuration management tools such as Puppet, Chef, and preferably Ansible 
  • Working proficiency in English 
  • Good communication skills (especially with developers) 

 

Nice to have: 

  • Experience in using GitLab for repo management and CI/CD 
  • Experience in Zabbix monitoring and ability to customize it 
  • Experience in Ubuntu Linux distro 
  • Experience or interest in docker and kubernetes 
  • Experience in one of the cloud providers such as Azure, Google Cloud and AWS 
  • Experience in installing/configuring MySQL databases 

 

What you’ll do: 

You will lead the devops operations such as: 

  • You will configure and manage a small pool of linux servers 
  • You will be responsible for monitoring, by integrating zabbix deeply with our services 
  • You will work closely with lead developers and help them build and maintain a stable ci/cd system 
  • You will communicate and co-work with client devops engineers of enterprise customers when necessary 
  • You will recommend solutions to devops problems and build your own if necessary 
  • You will write documentation of what you do when necessary 

 

What we offer:  

  • A new office at the center of Kadıköy, few minutes to Söğütlüçeşme metrobus and train stop. 
  • At least one day per week remote working possibility

We are looking for a talented Senior/Midlevel Python Developer to join our Engineering Team.
Key Responsibilities:

  • Ability to clearly communicate design decisions and trade-offs,

Be the Best!  Qualifications and Skills:

  • 3+ years of proven experience with building and deploying a large Django Web application,
  • Experience with building RESTful Web Services APIs, preferably using Django REST Framework (DRF),
  • Solid understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) and software engineering fundamentals,

Full stack developer,

We are looking to hire a JavaScript ninja! Our main stack consists of React, React Native and Node.js.

This is a role with front and backend responsibility with occasional mobile tasks in react-native therefore swift/objective-c and java are also assets though not musts.

We are developing embedded products and knowledge on low level programming would be great asset; Particularly C, ARM cortex assembly and BLE protocol. Again not musts and the bit of highest order for this role is JavaScript proficiency, React and Node.js.

We are looking to find a team mate that has done, built stuff to completion before.

Please send your resume,  your GitHub/GitLab work if you have and also state your  availability through e-mail to jobs@popperpay.com
We might also consider part-time for the right profile.

Meet Insider, the first integrated Growth Management Platform (GMP).


Insider Growth Management Platform (GMP) helps digital marketers drive growth across the funnel, from Acquisition to Activation, Retention, and Revenue. Leveraging real-time predictive segmentation powered by deep Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning capabilities, Growth Management Platform empowers marketers to deliver personalized journeys across the web, mobile web, mobile apps, and ad channels. Built on a unified data layer, GMP is easy to implement and simple to use, avoiding the need for complex integrations and dependency on IT teams. Insider simplifies the life of digital marketers and helps them drive growth for their brands, with zero marketing waste.


Insider is a technology company with offices in London, Singapore, Tokyo, Hong Kong, Seoul, Sydney, Helsinki, Barcelona, Dubai, Moscow, Warsaw, Taipei, Jakarta, Istanbul, Kiev, Ho Chi Minh City, Bangkok, Ankara and Kuala Lumpur. Insider was listed as one of Europe’s 100 Hottest Startups by WIRED Magazine and won Red Herring Top 100 Europe in 2017. CrunchBase has recently ranked Insider’s co-founder and CEO Hande Cilingir as one of the top three women CEOs outside of the US.


Some of the most prestigious Fortune 500 companies and top brands in retail, automotive and travel across the globe use Insider to deliver AI-backed personalized experiences. Helping world’s leading brands grow beyond the speed of customer expectations, Insider is trusted by over 400 businesses across various industries including UNIQLO, Singapore Airlines, Tokopedia, Virgin, New Balance, Nissan, Huawei, Samsung, Puma, Newsweek, Media Markt, AVIS, Allianz, BBVA, Dominos, McDonald’s, Avon and CNN.


Our engineers and developers are constantly harnessing the full force of the digital world to make a great impact, nurturing their work with innovation and shipping like artists to create beautiful and smart products. The product development and the technical team is located in Istanbul. Currently, we are running 120+ servers on an average, 75 Million requests, and sending 200 Million push notifications per day. In predictive we have accomplished to capture more than 50TB of historical data. We also successfully reached 25% of the global population.


Job Description

  • Working closely with CTO,
  • Preparing and editing correspondence, reports and presentations,
  • Planning priorities quarterly in technical task,
  • Managing projects and conducting research,
  • Making research on new technical trends and reporting new features on existing tech stack (Ex: AWS, Edge Computing, Go Lang, Robotics, Microservices etc.)
  • Monitoring performance progress,
  • Arranging cross department alignments on technical strategy.

Skills and Requirements:

  • Graduated from top universities,
  • Self-motivated and a good team player,
  • Knowledge of coding is a plus,
  • Excellent command of both written and spoken English,
  • Willingness and potential for learning and development in coding environment,
  • Willingness to work with agile methodologies,
  • Clear thinker and problem solver,
  • Contributing positively and proactively to new and changing situations,
  • Flexibility and adaptation to a challenging environment,
  • Ability to communicate and collaborate with developers, managers, and business operations on a daily basis,
  • Super energetic positive attitude, strong sense of humor and a hearty appetite for growth,
  • Enthusiasm to work for various development functions including Predictive, Mobile and DevOps etc.


What is it like to work at Insider?


We are underdogs, game changers, data-junkies, and outsiders. Coding is the heart of what we do but we acknowledge that codes die, codes break, codes evolve. What’s permanent is our engineering mind. Insider Engineers Team is where you can find the best tech minds in the industry fostering in what they are naturally good at, pushing each other’s limits to build disruptive technologies. We overcome challenges through hard work and innovation. You will work with some of the world’s most brilliant, passionate and dedicated people together to solve challenging problems.

About us:

NuVu is a full-time innovation school for middle and high school students. It is headquartered in Cambridge, MA, USA, but the development team is fully remote, current members residing in Turkey.


About the job:

All day-to-day flow for NuVu schools is currently powered by a custom platform (a content management / school management system) written in Ruby on Rails. We are currently developing the next version and we need help with client side application development as well as turning designs into html/css. You might be working on:

  • A custom client-side presentation editor (we basically need powerpoint on the web)
  • Chat/video components
  • Remote collaboration tools
  • Designing UX throughout the site


While we need strong javascript application development, you must also be able to turn designs (handed out by our designer) into code. Bonus points for Ruby on Rails experience.


Proficiency in English is a must.


We look forward to hearing from you.

Sunucu, veritabanı, kod optimizasyonu konularına hakim,
Tam zamanlı çalışacak

About Us:
SkyAtlas, provides real cloud infrastructure and services with large pools of compute, storage, and networking resources in multiple datacenters since 2013. Thanks to our “Patent-Pending” technology, we deliver high-performance infrastructure and services on demand. As one of the must distinguish cloud service provider in MEA area, we’re growing and so we’re hiring.
About the job:
To be part of the team, you have to be an individual who wants to be proud of the product you build and keen on customer satisfaction.
If you’re motivated to take responsibility for delivering a project while you’re teaching your team mates as much as learning yourself. Willing to being close to the decision-making process, passionate to go the extra steps to make sure the job is completed and the client satisfied. Experienced with both cloud-based and on-prem technologies, including hard-core Linux, several virtualization platforms, software defined storage and virtual networking, you may be the elusive super-hero we've been looking for.
Your mission should you choose to accept it:
  • Contribute to installation, migration, updates and integration of OpenStack services and modules.
  • Maintaining system's current infrastructure such as, Web application servers, DNS servers, monitoring services, etc.
  • Experience working, configuring and building tools for process automation and management.
  • Troubleshoots problems, responds to escalation, actively perform investigation and implement the solution.
  • Planning, coordinating, and executing technical processes.
  • Maintaining network and system security.
  • Evaluating and modifying system's performance, system performance tuning.
  • Documenting the architecture and configuration of the infrastructure.
Desired Skills and Experience:
  • Linux system administration experience and good familiarity with Linux shell scripting (Must)
  • Experienced in multiple types of virtualizations such as KVM. (Must)
  • Experience in Cloud Technologies and OpenStack platform.
  • Advance knowledge of network and system security.
  • Knowledge of Bash scripts, Puppet, Git and other automatization tools.
  • Familiarity with OpenSource universe.
  • Experienced in Datacenters.
  • Strong communication and documentation skills.
  • Ability to prioritize assigned tasks to ensure timely goal achievement
  • Problems solving abilities, systematic approach to root cause analysis and proper solution definition.
  • Effective written and oral communication skills in Turkish and English to share information.
 
 
If those responsibilities look good to you and you have some, preferably all, of the qualifications above, please send your resume to career@skyatlas.com. If you become the part of our team, we’ll never miss your birthdays. Seriously.

Role
We are looking for a highly motivated mobile engineer specializing and creating exceptional user experiences. You will need strong software engineering skills, excellent interpersonal communication, and experience accepting and giving meaningful feedback on technical designs. You will be responsible for the look and feel of the user experience, architecture, and front-end graphics. You will need to collaborate with our design team and back end developers. takım arkadaşları arıyoruz.

Net Consulting is a company aiming to provide all kinds of Human Resources Management partnership solutions geared towards improving effectiveness and efficiency of mid to large size organizations. We provide our services through a highly selective team of Specialists and Generalists in Human Resources Management area. Based on the promise that the human capital is the most valuable asset to an organization, our mission is to ensure the establishment of systems enabling the high performance of each and every individual contributing towards corporate objectives.

We are searching for Backend Developers (junior, mid level and senior) for our business partner in mobile technology industry. 

Here’s what you fundamentally need to be qualified to work at our client:

• Node.js
• Redis
• MongoDB
• AWS
• Docker

At Mobven, we are passionate about creating exceptional mobile solutions. Established in 2012, our company has evolved from a startup into an award-winning mobile technology company with offices in Istanbul and Izmir. Mobven has been awarded as Turkey’s fastest growing top 50 tech companies by Deloitte, 2 years in a row.

We are looking for Frontend Developers with the ambition to be game changers in the industry by creating innovative and exciting products and who would love to be a key stakeholder in our agile environment.

WHAT WILL YOU BE DOING?
 
We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.

Responsibilities:
Develop new user-facing features
Build reusable code and libraries for future use
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs
Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability
Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end
Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders
 
WE NEED YOU TO HAVE...

Proficient understanding of web markup, including HTML5, CSS3
Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms, such as LESS and SASS
Proficient understanding of client-side scripting and JavaScript frameworks, including jQuery

Should have the knowledge of advanced JavaScript libraries and frameworks, such as AngularJS, KnockoutJS, ReactJS, Vue.JS etc.
Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, partial page updates, and AJAX
Basic knowledge of image authoring tools, to be able to crop, resize, or perform small adjustments on an image. Familiarity with tools such as as Gimp or Photoshop is a plus.
Note: A UI/UX designer is expected to deliver finished resources for the developer to incorporate into the app. However, quite often a front-end web developer needs to make some small adjustments.
Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them.
Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as {{Git / SVN}}
 
TO BE CONSIDERED...
 
Please either apply by clicking online or emailing us directly to hr@mobven.com.
 
WHAT WE OFFER
 
·    Opportunity to work and gain experience at prestigious projects for leading companies in Turkey and abroad,
·   Be a part of a talented team
·   You’ll be able to use the most up-to-date mobile software architectures, technologies and frameworks
·   You’ll be able to grow & learn by sharing experience within the team
·   You’ll be gain responsibilities, take initiative and accelerated progress
 
BENEFITS 

·   Inspiring and open company culture
·   Online training opportunities; such as, LinkedIn Learning
·   Free English classes
·   Fresh fruit and other snacks onsite
·   Fun corporate events :)

We are looking for Android Developers with the ambition to be game changers in the industry by creating innovative and exciting products and who would love to be a key stakeholder in our agile environment. 

Required Skills and Experience:

  • B.S. degree or above in Computer Science/Engineering or relevant areas
  • 3+ years solid experience in mobile software development experience and published examples on the Play Store
  • Excellent programming skills preferably in Kotlin
  • Excellent command of design patterns, coding conventions 
  • Experience in web service integration (REST, JSON)
  • Experience in using version control
  • Scoping and estimation skills

  • HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, konularında tecrübe sahibi,
  • Vue.js, veya React gibi teknolojilerden en az birinde tecrübe sahibi,
  • Tercihen PHP, Laravel Framework bilen,
  • Konusu ile ilgili yeni teknolojileri takip eden,
  • Zaman yönetimi konusunda başarılı, verilen işi taahhüt ettiği sürede bitirebilen, bunun gerçekleşmesi için gerekli tedbir ve aksiyonları alabilen,
  • Araştırmayı seven, dijital trendleri yakından takip eden,
  • Analitik düşünme becerisi gelişmiş, sonuç odaklı, problem çözmeyi seven,
  • Esnek mesai saatlerine değil verimli mesai saatlerine odaklı,
  • Sorumluluk ve iş disiplini sahibi,
  • Çalışmaları ile ilgili bir portfolyo sunabilecek,
  • Erkek adaylar için askerlik görevini tamamlamış veya en az 2 yıl tecilli

ReactJS, Vuejs ama en önemlisi Angular nedir bilen, bu teknolojilere az da olsa eli değmiş,
Laravel framework'u ile uğraşmış, SOLID nedir bilen, İnternetin ve tarayıcıların nasıl çalıştığını açıklayabilecek,
Bu teknolojilerle yaptıklarından gurur duyan ve portfolio sunabilecek,
Döküman okuyabilecek ve okuduğunu anlayabilecek kadar İngilizce bilen, StackOverflow cevaplarını "translate" butonuna basmadan okuyabilen,
yeni teknolojileri öğrenmekten ve uygulamaktan keyif alırken eski teknolojilerle geliştirilmiş projelerin bakımını yapabilecek

Fullstack developer arıyoruz.

We create e-commerce and corporate websites mostly with PHP based frameworks (Magento, Craft CMS, etc. - Sorry, no Wordpress), this position will take a leading role in development.
You won't be writing any HTML/CSS, but you'll be expected to integrate those into template files.
We try to avoid monolithic sites and try to use everything headless where possible; along with frontend engineers, you will be architecting the service layer of these projects.
We expect you to write clean, testable and maintainable code; pursue emerging technologies and methods; come up with ideas to do better each day. We conduct code-reviews and pair programming activities and expect you to participate actively.

Requirements
You have;
  • Minimum of 7 years of professional experience in the field,
  • Excellent understanding and solid experience with PHP and its major frameworks,
  • Excellent command of SQL, understanding of ElasticSearch and NoSQL databases,
  • Excellent understanding of web services (Rest, GraphQL, etc.), message queues, in-memory databases, key-value stores, etc.,
  • Understanding of template languages (Twig, Blade, etc.) and HTML/CSS/Javascript.
  • Good knowledge on version control (Git), build tools, CI/CD, containerization (Docker), and ability to survive the Linux command line,
  • Completed your military service.

Nice to haves and soft skills;
  • Hands-On experience with Python, Go, Javascript, etc.
  • Experience with agile development and project management practices,
  • Understanding of BDD, and software testing practices,
  • Knowledge of cloud ecosystems,
  • Excellent interpersonal skills,
  • Learner for life, self-motivated, self-purposed, self-starter,
  • Good command of written and verbal English; we expect you to participate in conversations with international clients over Zoom, Slack, etc.

Please note that, we'll ask you to develop a sample project for us (should not take more than 10-12 hours, we respect your time) as a part of the interview, unless you are a regular contributor to open-source projects.

company.name: Siyah Araştırma Geliştirme Haberleşme Yazılım Finans ve Güvenlik Teknolojileri Tic. Ltd. Şti.

data.description:
Genellikle javascript ağırlıklı olarak mobil ve web uygulamaları geliştireceğiz, Firmamız Küçükçekmece/Halkalı metroya 40 metre mesafede olup merkezi konuma ve residence yapıya sahiptir. Birden fazla yazılımcıya ihtiyacımız olup planladığımız büyük projeler için çalışmalarımızı hemen başlatacağız. Backend olarak php, laravel kullanacağız. Kodlarımızı git üzerinden versiyonlayıp, mobil uygulamalarımızı react native ile yapacağız. Firmamızda birden fazla yazılımcı kadrosuna ihtiyaç duyulmaktadır. Özellikle Php, laravel framework'ü üzerinde deneyimli yazılımcılarla ilgilenmekteyiz. Yazılımda olduğu gibi grafik alanında uzman bir kadroya da ihtiyacımız olduğunu belirtmek istiyoruz. 

Firmamız 2019 yılının mart ayında kurulmuş olup büyük hedeflere sahip anonim şirketidir, çalışanlarının refah düzeyine oldukça hassas yaklaşacağımızı önceden belirtmek isteriz. İlgili üniversite bölümlerinden mezun olan başvuru sahiplerine daha çok odaklanıp, üniversite mezunu olmayanların başvuruları da değerlendireceğiz.

Workstation olarak imac bilgisayarları tercih ediyoruz ve duruma göre yazılımcıya ayrı odalar tahsis edebilecek imkanlara sahibiz. Çalışma ortamında esnek olduğumuz gibi çalışma saatlerinde de esnek davranmaya çalışarak yazılımcıdan en iyi performansı almayı hedefliyoruz.

2004 yılında kurulan Radore, ilk veri merkezi yatırımını 2005 yılında gerçekleştirdi. “Uptime Experts” sloganı ile güvenilir ve kesintisiz hizmeti ilke edinen Radore, %99,99 “uptime” garantisi ile müşterilerine sunucu barındırma (colocation), sunucu (dedicated) ve donanım kiralama, bulut sunucu servisi (cloud), yönetilen hizmetler, içerik dağıtım ağı (CDN), paylaşımlı web hosting, alan adı ve SSL gibi veri merkezi hizmetleri sunuyor.

  • Yazılım geliştirme alanında en az 4 yıl tecrübeli olmak
  • C#, Nesne Yönelik Programlama (OOP), ASP.net (Web Forms), ASP.net (MVC), Entity Framework, Linq konularında deneyimli olmak
  • Veri tabanı tasarımı (Microsoft SQL Server ve T-SQL) konularında deneyimli olmak
  • Design Patterns, Unit Testing, Clean Code konularında deneyimli olmak
  • Web Api, web servis, microservis, SOA, konularında deneyimli olmak
  • Javascript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3 konularında bilgi sahibi olmak
  • Tercihen ERP, Continuous Integration, TDD konularında bilgi sahibi olmak
  • Tercihen Microsoft Dynamics Platformu hakkında bilgi sahibi olmak
  • Tercihen Redis vb. cache yapıları hakkında bilgi sahibi olmak
  • Askerlikle ilişiği bulunmamak veya en az 2 yıl tecilli olmak
  • Belirlenen kalite standartlarını koruyarak ve sistemi ileriye taşıyarak yazılım geliştirme faaliyetlerinin yürütülmesi,
  • Analizden gelen geliştirmeleri hayat geçirmek
  • Yazılım faaliyetini gerçekleştirdikten sonra yazılımcı testinin gerçekleştirilmesi,
  • Mevcut yazılım envanterinin takibi, bakımı ve çalışma sürekliliğinin sağlanması,
  • Gerektiğinde ön proje çalışmalarının yürütülmesine katkı sağlamak

We are looking for a .NET Developer having the following qualifications to be employed in our company.
 
  • BSc degree in Computer Engineering or Software Engineering from a reputable university 
  • Minimum 2-3 years of experience in a similar position
  • Good understanding of object orientation, software architectures, SOA and design patterns
  • Experience of application development with .Net Core, at east 2 years of experience of C#.
  • Excellent programming skills in Microsoft .Net Core, MVC, C# and SQL knowledge
  • Experience in conception and development of web applications and web services (RESTful, SOAP, etc.)
  • Experience in managing source in Git and in Git workflows based on branching, merging etc.
  • Experienced in microservice development for multi-user high-traffic system
  • Jquery Framework, HTML, Javascript, Ajax, AngularJS, React knowledges are essential
  • Eager to learn new technologies
  • Experience in relational database design and development including Oracle, MySQL, SQLServer
  • Good team player, result oriented attitude and analytical mind
  • Problem solving and analytical thinking skills are advanced.
  • High energy and drive
  • Male candidates must have complated their military obligations or at least postponed it for 2 years.

Preferably, the ideal candidate should be able to have the following:

  • Experience in framework design, ORM, Component Based Software Engineering
  • Experience in process analysis and design
  • Experience with AWS or other Cloud Computing services.
  • Experience with AWS CI Services like CodeDeploy, CodePipeline is a plus

çalışma arkadaşı arıyoruz.

İstanbul'da bulunan müşterilerimiz için aşağıdaki niteliklere uygun mid ve senior seviyede frontend yazılım geliştiricileri arıyoruz.

Uygun profildeki arkadaşlar bize ik@talentops.net adresi üzerinden ulaşabilir ve güncel özgeçmiş dosyalarını iletebilir.

Talentops olarak yetenekli yazılımcıları doğru firmalara yerleştiriyoruz. Her pozisyondan, her deneyimden iş arayan tüm yazılımcılar bize her zaman özgeçmişlerini iletebilir.

arkadaşları aramaktayız.

Dekopasaj is a second hand furniture marketplace based out of Istanbul. It launched in Jan 2015 and it is an end-to-
end solution for buyers and sellers, leveraging marketplace and consignment models. We provide logistics, payment, curation, consignment services. Take rate differs based on selling method between 25% and 50% (consigned furniture)

You will
  • Be in a great development environment
  • Take responsibility of back-end, api, and front-end of dekopasaj web site
  • Develop our APIs

Requirements

  • Hands-on experience in Vue.js or ability to work on
  • Experience in RabbitMQ, Apache Kafka or similar Message Broker systems is a big plus
  • Experience in IIS Management
  • Knowledge of Scrum and Kanban
  • Must be a DOer with positive mood
  • Eager to learn
  • Must be a team player, should adapt to technology culture in company
  • Being a team player with Agile mindset is a big plus

Bonus
  • Experience in using Microsoft Azure services (Virtual Machines, SQL Databases, Load Balancers, etc…)
  • Experience in using Octopus
  • Back-end development with any node.js stack
  • Full-Text search implementation knowledge
  • Knowledge of Request Tracing, Call Tracing, Monitoring and/or having general DevOps culture
  • Work experience in highly scalable projects is a big plus

We are a multinational company that creates multi platform solutions across the continents! 
In our company, we have multiple frontend projects such as backoffices of our all projects, terminal interfaces, international websites with high user interactivity and mobile interfaces. 
We are looking for Front-End Developer/s to join our Software Development Team to work with us in these exciting and unique projects! 

Required Experience: 
  • 2+ years of experience with Front-end technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, 
  • Hands on popular JavaScript frameworks such as Angular, ReactJs or VueJs, 
  • Experience in responsive web design, Good knowledge of version control systems e.g. Git. 

Preferred Experience: 
  • Knowledge of ES6, TypeScript, Excellent knowledge of JavaScript and component-based architecture, 
  • Good understanding of asynchronous request handling, 
  • Experience with CSS Preprocessors (Less, Saas), Experience with frontend tooling (Webpack/Grunt/Gulp/NPM). 

Big Plus: 
  • Knowledge/Experience of NodeJS, 
  • Knowledge/Experience of ElectronJS, 
  • Knowledge/Experience of with Javascript Testing (Unit, e2e).

GENEL NİTELİKLER 
  • Üniversitelerin Bilgisayar Mühendisliği ya da ilgili diğer mühendislik bölümlerinden mezun 
  • Yazılım geliştirme projelerinde en az 2 yıl tecrübeli, 
  • HTML5, CSS3 (Sass, less,), AJAX, Bootstrap 4x,3x, Javascript, jQuery teknolojilerine hakim, 
  • SPA (Single-Page-Application) geliştirme mimarisine hakim, 
  • Responsive Web Design ve Cross-Browser gelitşirme konusunda tecrübe sahibi 
  • WebAPI, Rest, JSON teknolohilerinde kendini geliştirmiş, UI Rest API implementasyonları yapmış, 
  • Modern ve yenilikçi web arayüzleri geliştirebilecek, 
  • Versiyon kontrol tarafında Git deneyimi olan 
  • Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop gibi tasarım programlarına hakim olması ve Mobil Uygulama UI/UX tecrübesi olması tercih nedenidir. 
  • Olmaz yerine “Nasıl oldururuz” diyebilen 
  • Öğrenmeyi, öğretmeyi ve en önemlisi paylaşımı seven 
  • Değişime ve gelişime açık. 
  • Çözüm odaklı, uzlaşmacı, pozitif bakabilen 
  • İş kadar sosyal hayatına da önem veren, yazılım geliştirme dışında da hobileri olan 
  • Yaratıcı, farklı açılardan bakabilen ve farklı fikirlere saygı duyan 

 İŞİN TANIMI 
  • Geliştirilecek projenin arayüz tasarımını gerçekleştirecek, back-end geliştiriciler ile planlı olarak ilerlemek. 
  • Hazır tasarımlar için gerekli front-end geliştirmeleri yapacak, yeni özelliklerin arayüzde performanslı çalışmasını sağlayacak, 
  • Projelerin tasarım aşamasında görev almak, katkıda bulunmak 
  • Uygulama süreçlerinde karşılaşılan problem ve yeni durumlara göre çözümler üretmek 
  • Performans iyileştirici geliştirmeler ve modifikasyonlar yapmak 
 
NEDEN MOBİLDEV?
  • Yerinde Ar-Ge merkezi olarak gelişime ve değişime ayak uyduran dinamik bir yapısı olması 
  • İçeride işlenmeyi ve müşterilere çözümler getirmeyi bekleyen big data havuzu olması 
  • Yapay Zeka – Makine öğrenmesi gibi bilimsel alanları kapsayan projeler geliştirmesi, 
  • Yeni teknoloji ve çözümlere yatırım yapan ve global olarak büyümeyi hedefleyen yönetim vizyonu 
  • Genç, dinamik ve gelişime açık genç kadrosunun olması • Sektöründe lider firmaları kapsayan geniş müşteri portföyü 
  • Bilimsel çalışmaları ve eğitimi destekleyen yapısı.

data.description:
GENEL NİTELİKLER
İstanbul’da faaliyet gösteren otomotiv sektöründe Türkiye’de 1 numara olan firmamızın yazılım departmanında görev alacak PHP Web Developer ihtiyacımız var.

GENEL NİTELİKLER:
  • PHP, HTML, CSS ve MySQL konularında tecrübe sahibi,
  • OOP ilkelerine hakim ve MVC tasarım desenine uygun yazılım geliştirmiş,
  • Codeigniter konusunda tecrübesi olan,
  • Tercihen react ve nodejs tecrübesi olan,
  • Webservis, API ve XML servis yapılarına hakim,
  • Versiyon kontrol sistemleri (SVN,Git) konusunda bilgi sahibi,
  • Ekip çalışmasına yatkın,
  • Araştırmayı seven, yeniliklere açık, sorumluluk sahibi,
  • Tercihen Avrupa yakasında oturan.

İŞ TANIMI:
  • Verilen projeler cercevesinde sitenin gelisimine katkıda bulunacak,
  • Kendisine atanan projeleri zamanında ve eksiksiz olarak teslim edebilecek çalışma arkadaşı aramaktayız.

Required qualifications:

  • Basic Linux experience
  • Basic understanding of virtualization and container technologies
  • Basic understanding of computer hardware, network equipment, and storage/backup solutions.
  • Basic system and application troubleshooting skills
  • Basic understanding of virtualization and container technologies

Preferred qualifications:
  • Development experience in one or more of Python, Java, Go, Node.js, Ruby, or Perl
  • UNIX Shell Scripting experience
  • Experience in Docker, Kubernetes
  • Experience with CI/CD frameworks such as Jenkins

We are a multinational company that creates multi platform solutions across the continents!
  
In our projects, we handle a lot of big and frequent requests both Server to Server and Client to Server around the world.

We also have a lot of data to process and we are looking for PHP Back-End Developer/s to join our Software Development Team to work with us in these exciting projects!



Required Experience:

  • Experience of OOP programming,
  • Experience of mysql and relational database systems,
  • Understanding of common Git workflows,
  • Not focused on framework,extensions or packages but focused on programming, to be able to adapt to an existing system,
  • Open to learn new technologies in case of new requirements.


Preferred Experience:

  • Excellent English skills for engineering communication is a big plus,
  • Experience with nosql ,
  • Experience with php unit test.
  • Knowledge of OOP Design Patterns
  • Experience of writing/integrating an API system, 
  • Experience with modern server components (Redis, RabbitMQ,,Docker), 
  • Knowledge of server to server communication (TCP, WEBSOCKET, HTTP 1.1,2),
  • Knowledge of RESTful architecture, 
  • Working in a collaborative team environment using tools like JIRA and Git 
  • Knowledge/experience with ElasticSearch system and queries

Big Plus:

  • Knowledge/experience with ElasticSearch system and queries
  • Experience with swoole
  • Knowledge/experience of async, parallelism and concurrent programming,

Albayrak Medya Grubu bünyesinde faaliyet gösteren ve internet üzerinde erişimi milyonlara ulaşan dijital yayın projelerinin yönetimini gerçekleştiren Piri Medya şirketinde görevlendirilmek üzere;

  • Tercihen lisans mezunu,
  • Benzer pozisyonda en az 4 yıl deneyimli,
  • Arayüz geliştirme konusunda tecrübeli,
  • HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery konularında tecrübe sahibi,
  • Angular, Vuejs, ve React Javascript frameworklerinde en az bir tanesinden tecrübe sahibi,
  • CSS Framework (Less ya da Sass) konusunda bilgi sahibi,
  • Cross-browser ve Responsive çözümleri konusunda deneyimli,
  • Kullanıcı deneyimi (User Experience) ve Kullanıcı Arayüzü (User Interface) tasarım prensiplerini bilen,
  • PSD ve XD formatındaki tasarımları Bootstrap alt yapısına uygun olarak HTML'e aktarabilen,
  • Konusu ile ilgili yeni teknolojileri takip eden,
  • Takım iletişimi ve yönetimi konularında deneyimli,
  • Frontend tarafındaki teknoloji kullanımı ve uygulanmasında karar verebilen.
  • Ekip arkadaşlarına teknik açıdan liderlik yapabilen.
  • Zaman yönetimi konusunda başarılı, verilen işi taahhüt ettiği sürede bitirebilen, bunun gerçekleşmesi için gerekli tedbir ve aksiyonları alabilen,
  • Araştırmayı seven, dijital trendleri yakından takip eden,
  • Analitik düşünme becerisi gelişmiş, sonuç odaklı, problem çözmeyi seven,
  • Esnek mesai saatlerine değil verimli mesai saatlerine odaklı,
  • Sorumluluk ve iş disiplini sahibi,
  • Çalışmaları ile ilgili bir portfolyo sunabilecek,
  • 38 yaşını aşmamış,
  • Erkek adaylar için askerlik görevini tamamlamış veya en az 2 yıl tecilli.

"Front-end Takım Lideri" alınacaktır.

Albayrak Medya Grubu bünyesinde faaliyet gösteren ve internet üzerinde erişimi milyonlara ulaşan dijital yayın projelerinin yönetimini gerçekleştiren Piri Medya şirketinde görevlendirilmek üzere;
  • Tercihen lisans mezunu,
  • Benzer pozisyonda en az 2 yıl deneyimli,
  • Arayüz geliştirme konusunda tecrübeli,
  • HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Ecmascript konularında tecrübe sahibi,
  • Angular, Vuejs, veya React gibi teknolojilerden en az birinde tecrübe sahibi olmak,

  • Esnek mesai saatlerine değil verimli mesai saatlerine odaklı,
