  • 38 yaşını aşmamış,
  • Erkek adaylar için askerlik görevini tamamlamış veya en az 2 yıl 

"Front-end Developer" alınacaktır.

The QA and release manager role plays an important part in Brew's delivery process. You'll be responsible for conducting tests before releases to ensure software runs smoothly and meets the projects needs.

You'll be working closely with developers to create well-structured test automation scripts, keep them up-to-date and track their executions.

Ultimately, we want to automate our UI and acceptance tests; we expect you to team up with product, design, development teams and coordinate all related activities.

We expect you to;

  • Review requirements, specifications and business analysis documents to provide feedback,
  • Create a comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases,
  • Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities, make the go, no-go decisions for releases,
  • Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved,
  • Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs,
  • Track quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts,
  • Stay up-to-date with new testing tools and test strategies.

Requirements

You have;
  • Minimum of 4 years of professional experience in the field,
  • Bachelors degree in engineering, or prior experience in software development, business analysis or UI/UX design.
  • Experience with agile quality assurance and project management practices,
  • Excellent understanding of UX practices; you immediately see if a UI design is poorly implemented, or not working as it should,
  • Good understanding of BDD, TDD and similar quality focused development approaches,
  • Good command of SQL and CLI/GUI tools (Postman, JMeter, cURL etc.) to interact with remote services.

Nice to haves and soft skills;
  • Understanding of browser automation tools and test automation libraries,
  • Knowledge on version control (Git), build tools, CI/CD, containerization (Docker), and ability to survive the Linux command line,
  • Excellent interpersonal skills,
  • Learner for life, self-motivated, self-purposed, self-starter,
  • Good command of written and verbal English; we expect you to participate in conversations with international clients over Zoom, Slack, etc.,
  • Completed your military service.

Bilgin Pro ailesine katılarak geliştirdiğimiz projelerde rol almak üzere;

  • PHP'nin temel yapısına ve OOP prensiplerine hâkim,
  • Laravel, Symfony gibi frameworkler ile proje geliştirmiş,
  • Frontend teknolojileri (HTML, CSS) temel bilgi sahibi,
  • Yeni teknolojilere açık, yeni bir teknoloji öğrenmeye hevesli,
  • Müşterilerin isteklerini anlayarak çözüm üretebilecek,
  • Takım çalışmasına yatkın ve sorumluluk bilincinin yüksek,
  • Kendini geliştirmeye istekli ve öğrenmenin sonunun olmadığını bilen
takım arkadaşları arıyoruz.

Artı puan olacak özellikler;
  • Aktif çalışan web projeleri geliştirmiş olması.
  • Linux sistemlerle haşır neşir olması.
  • Aktif olarak Git kullanıyor olması.
  • Python, Go, Java gibi dillerde temel de olsa bilgi sahibi olması.

İstanbul anadolu yakası Kartal ofisimizde çalışmak üzere. 
It alanında lisans mezunu.
Scrapy konusunda iyi derecede bilgi sahibi. 
Disiplinli çalışmayı seven ekip arkadaşları arıyoruz.

Efectura is hiring Java developers.

Great news! We are welcoming Dubai with a new exciting project. We are now looking for Java developers who are adventurous and passionate enough to fly to Dubai as a part of the growing Efectura team.

- Location: Dubai
- Competitive salary
- Relocation package

- Candidate should have min 3+ years of software development experience
- Design and development experience with Micro service architecture
- Extensive experience with Hibernate, Spring Boot (MongoDB is a plus)
- Orchestration using design patterns and tools not limited to rules engines (Apache Camel, Drools)
- Cloud integration with any cloud vendors
- Build clean REST API's which are shared with Open API
- Understating of containerization using Dockers and its implementations
- Adhere to best practices, such as, Unit Testing, TDD and Continuous Deployment
- Swagger API documentation,
- Java 1.8
- Working with Banking Domain or sector.
- Work proficiency level English skills.

CVs to: cv@efectura.com

Good works.

Senior engineers who have extensive experience in the DevOps space who want help shape the processes of an already strong infrastructure team.

We are looking for a Senior DevOps Engineer having the following qualifications to be employed in our company.

Primary job responsibilities
  • 8+ years of experience
  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related technical discipline.
  • Experience in one or more configuration management frameworks such as Puppet, Chef, Terraform, Ansible
  • High interest in Big Data scenarios, a good technology background and experience in working with engineering teams
  • Fluent in one or more scripting languages (such as Python, Go, Shell Scripting)
  • Experience in hosting applications in virtualized environments such as KVM / VMWare
  • Experience in managing source in Git and related workflows
  • Experience in managing CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins, Bamboo, Gitlab-CI
  • Strong experience with IT security practices such as encryption, certificates and key management (like Hashicorp Vault, OpenKMS)
  • Experience administering monitoring and alerting tools like Prometheus, Grafana, Nagios, Graphite
  • Fluent English both spoken and written
  • Experience administering open source server software (such as Nginx, Kafka, RabbitMQ, Redis, Elasticsearch, Cassandra)
  • Experience in building and improving CI/CD pipelines automating builds, deployments and process. Deep experience with Jenkins (or similar tools) is important
  • 3+ years of experience with Experience ELK, log management and analysis, Metrics reporting, builds and performance monitoring/tuning of various infrastructure
  • Experience with tools such as Docker and Docker-based deployments
  • Experience in cluster management/orchestration technologies (such as Kubernetes)
  • Building large-scale web applications and working with distributed systems experience
  • Experience in managing firewalls (Cisco ASA/WSA), Proxy, VPN, F5 Load balancer, Fortinet, Internet security, PCI compliance.

• Minimum 2 yıl .NET teknolojileriyle(C#, MVC, WCF, WPF) yazılım geliştirmesi tecrübesi olan veya PHP Frameworklerinden birini kullanan,
  • Microsoft SQL Server üzerinde yazılım geliştirme tecrübesi olan (View, Stored Procedure, SQL/TSQL), veya MySQL tecrübesine sahip,
  • Json, jquery, ajax, HTML, XHTML, CSS, XML, JavaScript, AJAX konularında deneyim sahibi,
  • Kurumsal web tasarım ve uygulama konusunda tecrübeli,
  • Güvenli ve test kontrollü kod geliştirme bilgisi olan,
  • Sorun çözme odaklı ve müşteri odaklı yaklaşım sahibi,
  • İletişim yönü güçlü,
  • Değişime, yeni teknolojilere ve gelişmeye açık adayların başvurularını bekliyoruz.

data.position: Senior Unreal Engine VR & Game Developer
data.description:
Hi everyone,

We are looking for a long – term full-time Senior Software Engineer with good Unreal Engine knowledge to join our developer team. Together with our other team members, you will create codes that give life to mobile and virtual reality games that our users. This position comes with exciting engineering challenges that we will solve with the latest technology approaches. Especially in virtual reality and augmented reality solutions we will step into many new innovations.

What you will do;

- Create wonderful experienced mobile & VR games for millions of users who play every day.
- Design, implement, test and maintain gaming products.
- Write clean, sustainable code and participate in code reviews
- Brainstorm with the team to constantly emphasize and improve the user experiences of our games
- the experiences of virtual reality

Desired skills and experiences

-         Strong C++ knowledge and multi-threaded programming techniques
-         Experience in Unreal Engine 4 C++ programming
-         High experience in Unreal Engine Blueprint
-         Open- minded about development and optimization skills
-         Result-oriented approach and thinking
-         Being innovative while thinking next steps 
-         Self-motivated and able to dive into a complex system with quick results
-         Ability to complete projects in Unreal Engine with an emphasis on performance skill 
-         To familiar with rendering algorithms, and data structures 
-         For male candidates, Military Services should be completed or postponed at least 2 years.
-         We are located in “Sakarya Teknokent” as VR and gaming research and development company. For full time working, we are looking for teammates preferably residing in Sakarya or near closer it.

company.name: Alkosoft Bilişim Endüstrisi Tic. ve San. Ltd. Şti.

data.description:
Niğde Teknopark içerisinde yeni açılacak olan firmamızda freelance veya ofis ortamında çalışacak takım arkadaşları aramaktayız.

  • Tercihen üniversitelerin ilgili Ön Lisans veya Lisans bölümlerinden mezun veya eğitimine devam eden,
  • Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Indesign (Adobe CC) grafik programlarını iyi derecede kullanabilen,
  • Çalışmalarına ait referansları sunabilecek,
  • Web sitesi ve mobil uygulama tasarım ve güncelleme konusunda tecrübeli,
  • HTML5, CSS3 , Bootstrap ve Javascript Framework konularında bilgi ve deneyim sahibi,
  • Sektördeki gelişmeleri ve trendlerini yakından takip eden,
  • Dikkatli, disiplinli, hızlı çalışabilen, yaratıcı ve yenilikçi,
  • Kreatif bakış açısına sahip,
  • Özgün tasarım yeteneği olan ve görsel tasarım üretebilen,

Büyüyen yazılım ekibimiz için aşağıda belirtilen niteliklere sahip Çankaya'daki ofisimizde çalışmak üzere dinamik profesyoneller arıyoruz;

Nitelikler:
  • Arayüz geliştirme konusunda en az 2 yıl deneyimli
  • İyi derecede HTML, CSS ve Javascript bilgisi olan ve proje geliştirmiş,
  • Daha önce mobil/ responsive arayüz kodlamış,
  • Tercihen React ve/veya React Native ile proje geliştirmiş,
  • Takım çalışmasına yatkın,
  • Hızlı öğrenebilen ve kendini geliştirmeye hevesli,
  • Sorumluluk sahibi,
  • Erkek adaylar için askerliğini yapmış veya en az 2 yıl tecilli olan.

İş Tanımı:
Sektörlerinde lider şirketler ve kamu kurumları için özel olarak geliştirdiğimiz projelerde tam zamanlı çalışacak Front-end developer ekip arkadaşları arıyoruz.

Şirket hakkında:
Ankara'nın önde gelen yazılım şirketlerinden biri olarak 9 yıldır; web yazılım geliştirme, mobil uygulama geliştirme, dijital pazarlama ve danışmanlık hizmetleri sunmaktayız.

data.position: PHP / Backend Yazılım Geliştirme Uzmanı (İzmir ve Denizli)
data.description:
İş Tanımı:
Güvenlik ve Outsource İnsan Kaynakları konusunda 23 ilde hizmet veren firmamız bünyesinde geliştirdiğimiz CRM, ERP gibi uygulamaların geliştirici ekibinde görev yapacak Syfmony kullanan takım arkadaşları arıyoruz.

Aranan Nitelikler:
-PHP ve MySQL konusunda (uzman) ve en az 5 yıl tecrübe sahibi,
-Daha önce bir FW kullanmış, Syfmony kullanabilecek,
-SQL ve özelde MySQL'e hakim, Doctrine ve ORM ile özel sorunları çözebilecek tecrübeye hakim.
-NoSQL Tecrübesi olan,
-Git Kullanabilen,
-Jira, Phabricator vb. gibi iş takip uygulamalarına aşina,
-Takım çalışmasına uyumlu, remote çalışmalarda motivasyon kaybı yaşamayacak,
-Web Servisleri konusunda deneyimli (SOAP, REST),
-Yaptığı işi anlatabilecek,
-Açık fikirli ve yeni teknolojilerin araştırmasını yapabilecek,
-Denizli'deki genel merkezimizde yapılacak olan toplantılara iştirak edebilecek (Şehir dışı adaylar için)

Lokasyon:
Denizli ve İzmir

Kodia Hakkında
Kodia, siber güvenlik sektörünün ihtiyaçlarına yönelik milli çözümler üretmek amacıyla yerli sermaye ile kurulmuştur. Sektörde uzun yıllar siber güvenlik danışmanı olarak tecrübe kazanmış alanında yetkin danışman ve yazılımcı kadrosuyla kurumsal güvenliğin sağlanması için çözümler geliştirmektedir. Kurumların, siber güvenliği sağlamak adına başvurduğu çözümlerdeki eksiklikleri analiz ederek geliştirdiği yenilikçi çözümlerle proaktif güvenliğin sağlanmasına katkıda bulunmaktadır. Kodia, ArGe merkezinde geliştirdiği yenilikçi projelerin yanı sıra alanında yetkin siber güvenlik danışmalarıyla uçtan uça çözümler sunmaktadır.


Pozisyon Hakkında
Geliştirme aşamasındaki ürünlerin süreçlerine katılarak, bu süreçler boyunca tecrübe ve bilgi edinmek isteyen, kazanımlarını bize ve projeye aktaracak genç ve zihni açık arkadaşları beklemekteyiz. Staj boyunca gösterilen performansa göre birlikte çalışmaya devam edeceğimiz arkadaşları belirleyeceğiz. Böylece stajyerlerimiz için bir kariyer basamağı oluşturmayı hedeflemekteyiz.


Ön Gereksinimler
  • Ruby, Java veya FrontEnd(HTML, CSS, JavaScript) teknolojilerinden en az biri ile ilgili olmak.
  • Başvuru sonrasında verilecek projeyi başarıyla tamamlamak.
  • Kendini geliştirmeye açık tutmak.
  • Doküman okuyabilecek seviyede İngilizce.
  • Araştırma yönünü geliştirmiş olmak.
  • Ekip çalışmasına yatkın olmak.
  • Ekip arkadaşları ile iletişim kurabilmek.

company.name: Kodia Yazılım ve Bilişim Ltd. Şti.

data.description:
İş tanımı:

Yazılım stajyerleri geliştirmekte olduğumuz ürünlere yeni özelliklerin eklenmesi aşamasında görev alacaklardır. Bu kapsamda yazılım geliştirme ekibi ile çalışıp gerçek bir uygulamanın tüm geliştirme adımlarını öğrenme şansı elde edeceklerdir.

Gereksinimler:
  • En az 40 iş günü boyunca staj yapabilir durumda olmak
  • Java, Python, Ruby, Php veya Javascript dillerinden en az birine aşinalık
  • Object Oriented Programming kavramı hakkında temel düzeyde bilgi
  • Web teknolojilerine (HTTP, AJAX, Client-Server gibi kavramlar) aşinalık
  • GNU/Linux işletim sistemleri hakkında temel bilgi
  • En az bir sürüm kontrol sistemiyle (git, svn ve benzeri) çalışmış olmak
  • Teknik makale okuyabilecek kadar İngilizce bilmek

  • Yazılım geliştirmede "best practice"leri öğrenmek
  • Spring Boot, Hibernate, Javascript, Redis gibi modern teknolojileri öğrenme imkanı
  • Şirket içi eğitimlere katılma imkanı
  • Yemek yardımı
  • Staj sonrası part-time/full-time çalışma imkanı

İş tanımı:

Yazılım stajyerleri geliştirmekte olduğumuz ürünlere yeni özelliklerin eklenmesi aşamasında görev alacaklardır. Bu kapsamda yazılım geliştirme ekibi ile çalışıp gerçek bir uygulamanın tüm geliştirme adımlarını öğrenme şansı elde edeceklerdir.

Gereksinimler:

  • Java, Python, Ruby, Php veya Javascript dillerinden en az birine aşinalık
  • Object Oriented Programming kavramı hakkında temel düzeyde bilgi

We develop RegTech solutions using blockchain technology at Creosafe. Our ideal candidate will have expert knowledge of web-based application development processes as well as emerging web technologies. If you think exploring and making best of a relatively young tech environment sounds exciting, we'd like to hear from you.

Position Goals
* Develop innovative eco-systems that are constantly evolving, code reviewed, tested, and hardened
* Reach short and long-term objectives in a highly experienced team while maintaining code quality and scalability

Skills and Qualifications
* React
* Javascript
* Web Application Development
* 2+ years of frontend development experience in Javascript
* Strong understanding of programming concepts and ability to develop detailed application designs using proven industry patterns and best practices
* Working knowledge of GraphQL & REST APIs
* Proficiency with HTML5, CSS3 as well as multiple libraries/frameworks
* Fluent enough to understand and code in English, as well as read technical documents
* Strong task completion skills and experience with fast-paced development cycles

Responsibilities
* Collaborate with team, regularly push code to Git source control system
* Produce clean, readable, and properly documented code
* Active status reporting/tracking using agile or scrum methodology

Preferred Qualifications
* Bachelor’s degree in technology or innovation or related field of study
* Highly skilled in written English
* React Native
* Working knowledge of micro-frontends pattern
* Backend development experience using PHP or node.js
* Basic Linux shell knowledge

İş Tanımı
Geliştirici takımımıza katılmak üzere iyi derecede Unity ve Unreal Engine bilgisine sahip Senior Mobil Yazılım Mühendisi arıyoruz.Birimimizle birlikte kullanıcılarımızın sevdiği oyunlarımıza ve seviyelerimize hayat veren kodlar oluşturacaksınız. Bu pozisyon, son teknoloji yaklaşımlarla birlikte çözeceğimiz heyecan verici mühendislik meydan okumaları ile birlikte geliyor. Oyunumuzun yanı sıra, yazılım mühendisliği ve ekip olarak da büyüyoruz.

Yapacakların şunlar;
-Her gün oynayan milyonlarca kullanıcı için harika deneyimler oluşturmak.
-Gündelik oyun ürünleri tasarlamak, uygulamak, test etmek ve bakımını yapmak.
-Temiz, sürdürülebilir kod yazmak ve kod incelemelerine katılmak
-Oyunlarımızın kullanıcı deneyimlerini sürekli vurgulamak ve geliştirmek için ekiple beyin fırtınası yapmak

İstenilen beceri ve deneyimler
-C# programlama dilini iyi bilinmesi
-Unity ve Unreal Engine gibi oyun motorlarının iyi bilinmesi
-İyi Java ve Swift bilgisi.
-Sektörde yayınlanmış en az bir oyuna sahip olmak.

Büyümeye devam edeceğiniz alanlar
-Yüksek kaliteli kod geliştirme, yayınlama ve sürdürme.
-Güçlü mühendislik becerileri ve programlama temelleri
-Çeşitli programlama dilleri (c# ve java gibi) hakimiyeti ve bu dillerin uygulamaları hakkında deneyim.
-Yazılım mimarisi tasarımı, oop ve çeşitli ölçeklerde tasarım kalıpları prensipleri

Nerezza fırsat eşitliği sunan bir işverendir. Nitelikli tüm başvuru sahipleri yaş, soy aile veya tıbbi bakım izni ,cinsiyet kimliği veya ifadesi, genetik bilgi, medeni hal, cinsel yönelim veya geçerli yasalar ve düzenlemeler ile korunan herhangi bir başka özellik dikkate alınmadan incelenecektir.

İş Tanımı

Aranan Nitelikler

  • Laravel geliştirme ile minimum 3 yıl tecrübeli,
  • SOAP & REST API geliştirme hakkında tecrübeli,
  • ORM araçları hakkında tecrübeli (Eloquent, Doctrine etc.),
  • Distributed cache mimarilerinin kullanımı hakkında tecrübeli (Redis, Memcached),
  • No-Sql (MongoDB, RethinkDB, CouchDB),
  • Sql (PostgreSQL, Mysql)

Bilgi alanları;

  • OOP prensipleri hakkında bilgi sahibi,
  • PSR standartları hakkında bilgi sahibi,
  • İlişkisel ve ilişkisel olmayan veri tabanlarının çalışma prensipleri hakkında bilgi sahibi,
  • Dependency yönetimi hakkında bilgi sahibi
  • Websocket ve TCP
  • Detaylara önem veren,
  • Sürekli öğrenmeye ve gelişmeye açık,
  • Esnek mesai saatlerine değil verimli mesai saatlerine odaklı,
  • Takım çalışmasına yatkın,
  • Erkek adaylar için askerliğini yapmış ya da en az 2 yıl tecili bulunan

data.description:
Özgür Yazılım A.Ş. ailesine katılarak bizimle beraber özgür yazılım projeleri üzerine çalışacak ve özgür yazılım üretecek yeni ekip arkadaşları arıyoruz.

Programlama dili ayrımı yapmadan yazılım geliştiren firmamızın çeşitli özgür yazılım teknolojileriyle geliştirilen web uygulama projelerinde görev alacak yeni arkadaşlarımıza zaman içinde ilgi alanlarında uzmanlaşma olanağı sunuyoruz.

Başvuranlardan beklentilerimiz:
  • İngilizce teknik belgeleri zorlanmadan anlayabilecek düzeyde İngilizce bilmesi
  • Ön yüz teknolojilerine (HTML, CSS, JS) hakim olması
  • Drupal, WordPress ya da benzeri bir PHP altyapısı ile web uygulaması geliştirmiş olması
  • Mevcut bir karmaşık sistemin yapısını hızla kavrayabilmesi ve iyileştirme önerilerinde bulunabilmesi

  • Daha az deneyimli takım arkadaşlarını yönlendirebilmesi ve onları geliştirebilmesi

  • Başkalarının yazdığı kodları da gözden geçirebilmesi ve görüş belirtebilmesi
  • Kendisinin yazmadığı kaynak kodlarının içine dalıp, yolunu kaybetmeden sorun çözebilmesi

Zorunlu olmayan ama tercih nedeni olabilecek özellikler:

data.position: Game Developer - Unreal Engine and/or Unity
data.description:
We are looking for a Mobile Software Engineer to participate in our Engineering Team. Together with your team, you will be crafting code that brings to life game features, items and levels in our games which are enjoyed by millions of active users each month. This scale comes along with exciting engineering challenges which we are working together, using a technology-agnostic approach. Alongside with our game, we are growing as software engineers and as a team.

  • Build an amazing experience for the millions of users who play every day.
  • Design, implement, test and maintain our casual gaming products.
  • Write clean, sustainable code and participate in peer code-reviews.
  • You will have ownership of a primary work stream, which you will own end-to-end, but work in close collaboration with your fellow mobile engineers.
  • Brainstorm new ideas together with your team to continually iterate and improve user experience of our games.
  • There’s no need to have prior game development experience. If you are a good engineer and value a holistic and technology-agnostic approach to software engineering, we’d like to hear from you
  • Developing, releasing and maintaining high quality code.
  • Strong engineering skills and programming fundamentals.
  • Good command of various programming languages (such as C#, Java) and experience on best practices and idioms of these languages.
  • Software architecture design, OOP and design patterns principles on various scales.

Ekibimizde çalışmak üzere SAP SD konusunda 1-2 yıl deneyimli "SAP SD Modül Uzmanı" arıyoruz.

Aranan Nitelikler
• Üniversitelerin ilgili lisans bölümlerinden mezun,
• SAP SD modülünde minimum 1-2 yıl deneyime sahip,
• Satış, Dağıtım ve Sevkiyat süreçlerine hakim,
• SAP Projelerinde Modül Uzmanı, Analist veya Danışman olarak görev almış,
• Müşteri ihtiyaçları doğrultusunda çözüm üretebilecek,
• Araştırmacı, hızlı ve analitik düşünebilen,
• Erkek adaylar için askerlikle ilişkisi bulunmayan,

ABOUT US

Alta Bering is a business analytics and management consultancy company, specializing in performance management and performance data. We have a native advanced analytics platform called EPO (Enterprise Performance Optimizer). To support our customers and analytics, we are developing an advanced data marketplace.

We crawl hundreds of websites for product, price, performance and location data using our web scraper. We extract, sanitize and store the data in a single database.

We're a small, close-knit team dedicated to each other and our vision of deriving insights from data. Our culture is centered around problem solving through teamwork. We are looking for new team members in our Istanbul office.

The qualified candidate will be able to: think critically, communicate clearly, pay attention to process and quality, take initiative, and excel in a small team environment.

You are expected to follow agile development principles adopted by the Alta Bering team.

Your Responsibilities include:

•      Design captivating user interfaces with a focus on user experience and aesthetics
•      Create wireframes, mock-ups, and prototypes.
•      Envision new ways to visualize data and make it a reality.
•      Write reusable, testable, and efficient code and UI components
•      Create technical documentations for reference and reporting
•      Collaborate with the rest of the engineering team to design and launch new features.

Minimum requirements:

•      Minimum 3 years of software development experience
•      Deep understanding of usability design considerations in building Web-based applications that handle large volumes of data.
•      Excellent knowledge of JavaScript and component-based architecture
•      Excellent HTML5 and CSS knowledge, experience in Stylus, Sass or LESS
•      Hands on experience with a popular JavaScript framework such as ReactJs, AngularJs, or VueJs
•      Hands on experience with build tools (Gulp, Webpack, System.js)
•      Experience in RESTful / stateless API design and microservices architectural style
•      Good knowledge of Git/Gerrit, Jenkins, understanding of branching techniques and best practices

Other qualifications:

•      A degree in Science, Technology, Engineering or Math
•      Demonstrated problem solving, analytical skills in prior code and/or projects
•      Writing automated tests is a plus


How to Apply: Please send us your cover letter and resume in PDF format only. These can be emailed to careers@altabering.com. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview. Thank you for your interest in joining the Alta Bering team!

ABOUT US

Alta Bering is a business analytics and management consultancy company, specializing in performance management and performance data. We have a native advanced analytics platform called EPO (Enterprise Performance Optimizer). To support our customers and analytics, we are developing an advanced data marketplace.

We crawl hundreds of websites for product, price, performance and location data using our web scraper. We extract, sanitize and store the data in a single database.

We're a small, close-knit team dedicated to each other and our vision of deriving insights from data. Our culture is centered around problem solving through teamwork. We are looking for new team members in our Istanbul office.

You are expected to follow agile development principles adopted by the Alta Bering team.

Your Responsibilities include:

•      Write reusable, testable, and efficient code
•      Design and implement low-latency, high-availability Restful API endpoints
•      Develop and improve current data scraping framework
•      Perform unit tests, hunt and debug data errors
•      Create technical documentations for reference and reporting

Minimum requirements:

•      Proficient in Python or another popular object-oriented language
•      Expert web application development in Python using various frameworks
•      Strong knowledge of HTML/CSS selectors, regex
•      Proficient in automated test and documentation processes with CI/CD
•      Good knowledge of Docker and Linux, ideally in a working environment setting
•      Experience in developing applications with MySQL, PostgreSQL and NoSQL data stores
•      Good knowledge of Git/Gerrit, Jenkins, understanding of branching techniques and best practices.
•      Proficient in communicating and presenting in English

Other qualifications:

How to Apply: Please send us your cover letter and resume in PDF format only. These can be emailed to careers@altabering.com. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview. Thank you for your interest in joining the Alta Bering team!

QUALIFICATIONS

Requirements
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field of study
At least 5 years hands on experience with enterprise Linux environments
Good English knowledge, written and verbal
Must have strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills
Must have a solid working knowledge of RedHat Enterprise Linux or CentOS operating systems
Experience with kernel tuning for high-throughput web applications and identifying CPU/Mem/IO bottleneck
Experience with DNS management,application load balancing solutions for scaling and high availability
Working knowledge of Git, Nginx, Elastic management,
Experience administrating at least one of global monitoring systems
Configuration management experience using orchestration tools such as Puppet or Ansible
Strong programming/scripting languages (BASH, Pyhton, PHP, etc)
Experience managing virtualization technologies such as Docker or Xen
Able to work with distributed/cloud computing environment concepts.
Ability to work effectively in a fast paced changing environment,

Plus
Familiarity with content delivery networks(CDN) and streaming technologies
Datacenter management experience and knowledge

JOB DESCRIPTION
We are seeking an experienced DevOps Engineer with the ability to learn new technologies quickly and take on new responsibilities! The candidate will provide senior-level systems administration functions for Linux based environment, including project planning, systems design and engineering, performance optimization and collaboration with our international partners as required.
Roles
Install,optimize, maintain and upgrade Linux servers
Identify, troubleshoot and resolve operating system issues
Manage monitoring and alerting infrastructure to resolve and prevent problems
Implement and maintain scalable/high available storage systems
Develop automated approaches for system administration tasks where possible.
Work on internal R&D projects and development
Conduct research and development to drive innovation and propose new technologies

QUALIFICATIONS
BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field,
Working knowledge of software technology and systems development life cycle (SDLC),
Preferably with SaaS experience,
Min. 5 years of experience,
Problem solving and problem reduction skills,
Experience in project management,Jira and Git,
Knowledge of databases,linux system ,PHP and troubleshooting,
Understanding of business practices,
Excellent communication skills,
Analytical mindset,
Knowledge of detail test case,business process design,
Provide coordination with software development team.


Who we are?
Medianova is one of the fastest secure Content Delivery Network (CDN) companies in Europe and Middle East based on 3rd party Real User Analytics.
The core technology is API driven, containerized and based on caching the content as close as possible to the end-user.
The platform is powered with Anycast DNS, self service real-time panels and content optimization with GPU powered technologies.
Medianova was one of the 18 companies in Gartner’s 2018 Global CDN Market Guide Report  confirming mission to create a faster digital world with its agile platforms and services.
Medianova uses new technologies like patent pending Dockerized CDN Platform, TLS 1.3, HTTP/2, BBR and Brotli for a faster content delivery and better digital experiences.
With 32 datacenter footprint around the world, Medianova serves customers like Ebay, StarzPlay, Turkcell, Riot Games and Netmarble.
Give your website the speed it deserves with Medianova’s fast, secure and reliable Content Delivery Network (CDN).

Websitemiz: http://fuelthemes.net/
ThemeForest profilimiz: https://themeforest.net/user/fuelthemes

Biz kimiz?
Tamamı remote olarak çalışan, neşeli ve çalışkan bir startup şirketiyiz. Mevcut takım şu an itibariyle 4 tam zamanlı çalışandan oluşmaktadır. Bunların 2'si backend, 1'i frontend ve 1'i de IoT olarak çalışmaktadır.
Şirket tam finanse edilmiş (fully funded) durumdadır.

Ofis nerede?
Klasik anlamda bir "ofisimiz" bulunmamaktadır. Remote bir takım olduğu için çalışma ortamınızı kendiniz belirleyebilirsiniz. Ankara, İzmir, İstanbul nereden olursa olsun çalışabilirsiniz.

İş tanımı nedir?
Geliştirdiğimiz ürünün web sitesi için yeni sayfalar tasarlanmaktadır. Bu sayfaların HTML olarak kodlanması gerekmektedir. Bu işlemin de Tailwind Css frameworku ile yapılması gerekmektedir.

İşin gereksinimleri neler?
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Tailwind Css
  • Sass

Ücretlendirme ve çalışma şartları nasıl?
Bu işin ücretlendirmesi saat ile yapılmaktadır. Yani saat başına belirlenecek bir ücret ödemekteyiz. Bu ücret, yetkinliklerinize göre ödenmektedir.
Bu görevde iletişimi sürdürebilmeniz ve işi teslim edilip teslim etmeniz beklenmektedir. 

Bu kriterlere uyduktan sonra çalışma saatlerinizi kendiniz belirleyebilirsiniz.

- ÖNEMLİ -

Nasıl başvurabilirim?
Başvuru için kısa bir iş örneği istenmektedir. Beğendiğiniz bir sitenin herhangi bir kısmını Tailwind CSS ile yapıp başvurunuza ekleyiniz.

Eğer örnek site bulamıyorsanız, trello.com ana sayfasının hero kısmı olabilir. Sitedeki görselleri kullanabilirsiniz.

Teşekkürler!

· Yeni teknolojileri araştırmaya, öğrenmeye ve gelişime açık,

· Literatürü ve teknik metinleri takip edebilecek seviyede İngilizce bilen,

· En az 5 yıllık profesyonel iş deneyimine sahip,

· Yazılım süreçleri, analiz, yazılım gereksinimi belirleme, dokümantasyon, test senaryoları hazırlanması, test ve  kabul faaliyetlerini koordine etme konularında deneyim sahibi,

· UML diyagramları konusunda ve Yazılım Analist süreçlerinde kullanılan metodolojiler ve yöntemler konusunda bilgi sahibi,

· Aktif şekilde Yazılım Test araçlarını kullanabilen,

· Takım çalışmalarında etkin, iletişim gücü yüksek, sorumluluk sahibi,

· Erkek adaylar için askerliğini tamamlamış veya en az 2 yıl tecilli olan,


İŞ TANIMI:

· Geliştirilecek projelerde, süreç sahiplerinden ihtiyaçlarının öğrenilmesi,

· Projenin test planının hazırlanması,

· Analiz dokümanının hazırlanması,

· Analize uygun olarak test senaryolarının hazırlanması,

· Hazırlanan test senaryolarına uygun şekilde test süreçlerinin (arayüz, fonksiyonel, performans, yük, güvenlik, vb.) ilgili test araçlarıyla gerçekleştirilmesi,

· API/Arayüz otomasyon testleri için test kodlarının yazılması,

· Test sonuçlarında oluşan hataların çözümlenme sürecinin takip edilmesi,

· Canlı sistemler üzerinde tespit edilen hataların takibinin yapılması,

Symfony Framework'ü ile yazılım geliştirmede uzman,

MySQL ve Web Servislerine ileri düzeyde hakim,

Versiyon kontrol sistemi kullanımında bilgili (Git, SVN),

HTML5, CSS3, Javascript konusunda bilgi sahibi,

PHP yazılım geliştirme konusunda en az 3 yıl deneyimli Backend Developer arıyoruz!

Biz kimiz?

Tamamı remote olarak çalışan, neşeli ve çalışkan bir startup şirketiyiz. Mevcut takım şu an itibariyle 4 tam zamanlı çalışandan oluşmaktadır. Bunların 2'si backend, 1'i frontend ve 1'i de IoT olarak çalışmaktadır.

Şirket tam finanse edilmiş (fully funded) durumdadır.


Ne yapıyoruz?

İşletmelerin kullandığı, sahada yapılan işlerin takibini kolaylaştıran ve düzene sokmayı sağlayan bir yazılım üretiyoruz. Yazılımımızı kullanarak işletmeler, örnek olarak bir temizlik şirketi, personelinin yaptığı işleri takip ederek hangi işin ne zaman hallolduğunu veya işlerin hangi safhasında problem çıktığını anında görebilmektedir. Bu yazılımı farklı alanlarda faaliyet gösteren işletmelerin beğenisine sunmak istiyoruz.


Ofis nerede?

Klasik anlamda bir "ofisimiz" bulunmamaktadır. Remote bir takım olduğu için çalışma ortamınızı kendiniz belirleyebilirsiniz. Ankara, İzmir, İstanbul nereden olursa olsun çalışabilirsiniz.


Nasıl çalışıyoruz?

Yazılıma eklenecek yeni özellikler, şirket sahibinin de içinde bulunduğu "three amigos" toplantılarında karar veriliyor ve küçük görevler şeklinde Trello kartları olarak dağıtılıyor.

Bu yeni özelliklerin öncelikle API endpoint'leri hazırlanıyor. Yeni özelliğin API kısmı tamamen çalışır hale geldiğinde front-end kısımları bağımsız modüller olarak geliştirilmeye başlanıyor.


Geliştirme sürecini BDD metodolojisini takip ederek yapıyoruz.


Şirket içerisinde iletişim nasıl sağlanmaktadır?

%100 remote bir ekip aynı şekilde %100 bir iletişime sahip olmalıdır. Her çalışan, çalışma seansına başladığında Slack kanalı üzerinden diğer takım arkadaşlarına hangi Trello kartları üzerinde çalışacağını ve mevcut durumu engelleyen bir problem olup olmadığını bildirerek başlıyor. Bu şekilde öncelikli olan işlerin koordinasyonu başarılı şekilde sağlanabiliyor. 


Hiç birimiz stresli durumları sevmiyoruz. İletişimi en yüksek seviyede tutmanın stresli durumları olabildiğince önlediğini gördük. Sizden de takıma katılmanız durumunda iletişim kurallarını takip edip uyum sağlamanızı bekliyoruz.


Çalışma saatleri ve şartları nasıl?

Bir haftada 40 saatlik bir çalışma yapmanız beklenmekte. Bu sürenin ne zaman ve nasıl olacağını önceden belirleyebilirsiniz ve düzeninizi ona göre oluşturmakta özgürsünüz. Belirlediğiniz bu süre içerisinde sizinle iletişim kurabilmeyi beklemekteyiz. Acil durumlar için epeyce esneğiz, takımdan hiç kimse size aciliyetli bir durumunuz için olumsuz tepki göstermez. 

Anahtar kelime: Samimiyet.


Projemiz hakkında teknik detaylar

- Uygulamanın bütün ayarlarının yapıldığı back office kısmı desktop browserlarda kullanılmak üzere tasarlanmıştır.

- Uygulamanın sahada kullanılan kısmı ise modern mobil browserlarda çalışacak şekilde, Android için PWA ve iOS için ise homescreenden çalışabilecek şekilde bir SPA'dır.


Teknik beklentilerimiz

Bu pozisyon, bir front-end pozisyonu olduğundan aşağıda belirttiğimiz teknik özelliklere dikkat etmekteyiz:


  • JavaScript konusunda deneyimli olmanızı bekliyoruz. Vue, React veya benzer bir framework ile çalışmış olmanız ve kullanımına hakim olmanız gereklidir. Bu framework'lerin Lifecycle'larını anladığınızı ve anlatabilmenizi bekliyoruz. Sorabiliriz :)
  • RESTful API'ler ile önceden çalışmış olmanızı bekliyoruz.
  • State management konusunda VueX / Redux gibi library'ler ile çalışmış olmalısınız.
  • Agile Software Development'i benimsiyor ve Kanban kullanarak günlük işlerimizi takip ediyoruz. Sizin de bu konulara göz atmış olmanızı bekliyoruz.
  • Design pattern'lar konusunda bilgili olmanızı bekliyoruz.
  • Startup şirketinde geliştirilen bir projenin erken safhalarında yer alacağınızdan, olabilecek belirsizlikler konusunda umutsuz olmamanızı temenni ederiz. Ürün gelişimini müşterilerden gelen geri dönüşlere göre esnek şekilde yapacağız.
  • Takım çalışmasında deneyiminiz varsa bu bir avantaj olacaktır.


Tüm projede kullandığımız teknolojiler ve araçlar:

  • PHP 7
  • JavaScript
  • VueJS
  • CI
  • Git
  • Test Cafe
  • Yarn
  • Jest
  • Tailwind CSS
  • PhpStorm
  • WebStorm
  • PhpSpec
  • Behat


Neler sunuyoruz?

  • Konularında uzman çalışma arkadaşları. Birbirimizden çok şey öğreniyoruz.
  • Esnek çalışma saatlerine önem veriyoruz. Çalışma saatlerinizi kendiniz belirleyebilirsiniz.
  • Teknik bilginize dayalı, rahat yaşamanızı sağlayacak ücret.
  • Tüm resmi tatil günleri.
  • Greenfield proje olarak ilerlemekteyiz, dolayısıyla legacy kod bakımı yapmanız gerekmeyecek.
  • Testing bizim için olmazsa olmaz. Yüksek code coverage sayesinde debug etmesi kolay bir kod base ile çalışma imkanı sunuyoruz.


İşe alım sürecimiz nasıl işliyor?

Öncelikle sizinle teknik ağırlığı fazla olmayan kısa bir Skype görüşmesi yapacağız. Burada amacımız; karşılıklı olarak birbirimizi tanıyıp nasıl iletişim kurduğumuzu görmek. Bu esnada önceden geliştirmiş olduğunuz bir projeyi göstermek isterseniz de bakmak isteriz. İstediğiniz kadar bilgi aktarabilirsiniz.


Bu görüşmeden sonra size kısa bir take home assignment vereceğiz. Bu assignmentın içeriği, bizimle çalıştığınız zaman geliştirmeniz gereken gerçek bir modülden farklı olmayacak. Burada amacımız; karşılıklı olarak nasıl çalışabileceğimizi görmek.

Look, dijital deneyim tasarım ajansıdır. Strateji, tasarım ve teknolojiyi birleştirerek kullanışlı, keyifli, markaya değer katan dijital ürün ve servisleri geliştirme hizmetleri sunar. Ekibimize yazılım geliştirme ekibine çalışacak Front End Developer (Arayüz Geliştirme Uzmanı) arıyoruz.


  • Tercihen üniversitelerin ilgili bölümlerinden mezun
  • Ön yüz geliştirme konusunda en az 2 yıl tecrübeli
  • CSS pre-processorlerine ve task runner'lara hakim (tercihen SCSS, Gulp),
  • İyi derecede HTML5, CSS3 ve Javascript bilgisine sahip
  • Tarayıcı ve cihaz uyumluluğu konusunda bilgi sahibi
  • Yaygın CSS, Javascript kütüphane ve frameworkleri ile çalışan
  • Güncel web frameworklerine (tercihen; Angular, React, Vue.js) ilgi duyan
  • Erkek adaylar için askerlikle ilişiği olmayan ya da en az 2 yıl tecilli

PHP Yazılım Geliştirme Konusunda En Az 3 Yıl Deneyimli,
Versiyon Kontrol Sistemi Kullanımında Bilgili (Git, SVN),
Laravel (Blade) Framework'ü ile Yazılım Geliştirmede Uzman,
Tercihen Laravel Framework'ü ile CRM ve CMS Geliştirmelerinde Görev Almış,

Sizi en iyi şekilde yansıttığını düşündüğünüz projelerinizin URL'lerini mümkün ise panelli sistemlerinizi bir test kullanıcısı ile birlikte bize iletiniz.

company.name: Rüzgar Dijital Reklam Ajansı Sanayi ve Ticaret A.Ş.

data.description:
Web ve mobil projeler geliştiren ekibimiz için uzaktan çalışacak, yazılımcı çalışma arkadaşları arıyoruz.

Web tabanlı projelerimizin büyük bölümü .NET ile hazırlanmıştır. Dolayısıyla öncelikle .NET üzerinde deneyimli kişilere ihtiyacımız var. Bunun dışında native ios ve android geliştiriciler ve yetkin frontend geliştiriciler de başvurabilir.

Freelance/proje bazlı bir çalışma değil. Uzun süreli, mevcut projelere dahil olacak haftada en az 15-20 saatini düzenli olarak ayırabilecek tam zamanlı olarak bir yerde çalışmayan kişiler arıyoruz. 

İlgilenen kişilerin geçmiş deneyimleri, yazılım seviyeleri ve kendilerinden söz ederek bilgi@algoritmik.net adresine mail göndermelerini bekliyoruz. Diğer detayları telefon ile görüşebiliriz.

What we are building:


Fited is bringing digital innovation to medical bracing, orthopedics, prosthetics and implants. We use 3D printing, machine learning, remote sensing, and our patent-pending AI driven CAD technology (AICAD) to create elegant, accurate, patient-specific products in a safe and accessible process. Our first product focus is a globally accessible treatment for pediatric scoliosis with 3d printed scoliosis braces, though our software scales across knee braces, wrist braces, foot & ankle orthosis, and arm & foot prosthesis.


Fited is a global startup with offices in New York, Netherlands, and Izmir.


Job Description:


Fited is looking for entrepreneurial software engineers who are ready to inspire us and our global user base.


Join our multidisciplinary team of mathematicians, computational architects, community builders, biomechanical engineers, industrial designers, medical doctors, orthotists and software engineers to dream a better future for the healthcare industry in bringing digital innovation to the medical custom fit devices across diagnosis, prescription, and treatment in using the future present technologies across computer vision, 3D Modeling, machine learning, and deep learning.


About The Role:


* You will join our team in software design, authoring, documentation, execution, delivery, and deployment.

* You will collaborate in integrating the best-in-class experiences for our solutions

* You will enchant the team with your in depth knowledge of current, and future software technologies.

* You will strive and work towards getting community recognition of our solutions.


Your Basic Qualifications:


* Strong skills in designing and developing web-based applications and services using HTML5, CSS, and Javascript etc.

* Strong understanding of Object Oriented and SOA design concepts; experience in developing in Python with at least one web framework

* Strong experience with data modeling and relational/non-relational databases.

* Knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and crafting for performance.

* Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics or Engineering.


Your Preferred Qualifications:

* Excellent understanding and experience with unit testing, integration testing, and/or UI automation.

* Experience with event-driven programming, and server-side templating languages

* Experience with Firebase and/or Google Cloud

* Experience with Jenkins and other foundational frameworks

* Masters or PhD. Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics or Engineering.


Benefits:

* Opportunity to participate in the option plan of an early stage global start up.

* Opportunity to participate in our mission to provide globally accessible and affordable patient-specific medical devices.


Contact:

* Please email your resume to careers@fited.co

Büyüyen organizasyonumuz için global müşterimizdeki ekibimizin bir parçası olacak “Full Stack .Net Developer” arıyoruz.

·        Üniversitelerin Bilgisayar, Yazılım, Elektronik, Endüstri Mühendisliği, Yönetim Bilişim Sistemleri vb bölümlerinden mezun,

·     Uygulama geliştirme alanında 2-4 yıl deneyimli,

·     Yeni teknolojilere ve gelişmeye açık

·        Analitik düşünme yeteneğine sahip,

What we are building:


Fited is bringing digital innovation to medical bracing, orthopedics, prosthetics and implants. We use 3D printing, machine learning, remote sensing, and our patent-pending AI driven CAD technology (AICAD) to create elegant, accurate, patient-specific products in a safe and accessible process. Our first product focus is a globally accessible treatment for pediatric scoliosis with 3d printed scoliosis braces, though our software scales across knee braces, wrist braces, foot & ankle orthosis, and arm & foot prosthesis.


Fited is a global startup with offices in New York, Netherlands, and Izmir.

Join our multidisciplinary team of mathematicians, computational architects, community builders, biomechanical engineers, industrial designers, medical doctors, orthotists and software engineers to dream a better future for the healthcare industry in bringing digital innovation to the medical custom fit devices across diagnosis, prescription, and treatment in using the future present technologies across computer vision, 3D Modeling, machine learning, and deep learning.

* Strong understanding of Object Oriented and SOA design concepts; experience in developing in Python with at least one web framework

ASP.NET teknolojileri (Web Forms, MVC 4+,Webservis) ve C# programlama dillerinde tecrübeli, ilişkisel veri tabanı konusunda bilgi sahibi ve MSSQL Server deneyimi olan, CSS3 ve HTML5 konusunda kendini geliştirmiş, Angularjs, JavaScript, JQUERY, AJAX, Rest, JSON, XML web teknolojilerinden bir kaçına veya tümüne hakim, sözlü ve yazılı iletişimi iyi, takım çalışmasına yatkın, esnek çalışma saatlerine uyum sağlayabilecek, araştırma yapabilecek ve teknik içerik yorumlayabilecek seviyede İngilizce bilen, İstanbul Anadolu yakasında ikamet eden yazılım uzmanları alınacaktır.

ABOUT US


Our Company:


Alta Bering is a leading business analytics and management consultancy firm in performance management using advanced analytics. Alta Bering`s practice is deeply rooted in predictive analytics, data, and value-based management.


Our Culture:


The Alta Bering’s experienced, driven, and passionate team created a great product and uses it to serve customers from a wide variety of industries. We're a small, close-knit team dedicated to each other and our vision of deriving insights from data.


THE ROLE


What you'll do at Alta Bering:


At Alta Bering, we crawl hundreds of websites for product, price, performance and location data. We extract the data, we sanitize it and store it in a single database. You will be part of a team that develops web scrapers for each website we’re crawling.


We expect you to think critically and ask questions, be a detail-oriented, process-driven team player, and not be afraid to learn new things.


Responsibilities include:


- Develop at least 10 web crawlers each month


- Provide feedback and suggest process enhancements


- Ensure quality of the data and report crawler bugs or data errors whenever applicable



Minimum requirements:


- Proficient in HTML, CSS, and, Javascript


- Proficient in Python or another popular object-oriented language


- Proficient in using query languages such as SQL


- Proficient in communicating and presenting in both English and Turkish



Bonus qualifications:


- An associate degree in Science, Technology, Engineering or Math


- Experience in developing web scrapers in Linux environment with version control.


Please send your resumes to onurbilgili@altabering.com with a cover letter.

We are looking for a QA Tester to assess software quality through manual and automated testing. You will be responsible for finding and reporting bugs and glitches.


In this role, you should have a keen eye for detail and excellent communication skills. If you are also competent in executing test cases and are passionate about quality, we’d like to meet you.


Ultimately, you will ensure that our products, applications and systems work correctly.


Responsibilities

  • Review and analyze system specifications
  • Collaborate with QA Engineers to develop effective strategies and test plans
  • Execute test cases (manual or automated) and analyze results
  • Evaluate product code according to specifications
  • Create logs to document testing phases and defects
  • Report bugs and errors to development teams
  • Help troubleshoot issues
  • Conduct post-release/ post-implementation testing
  • Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle


Requirements

  • 2-5 years experience as a QA tester or similar role, especially SaaS applications experience is a plus
  • Experience in project management and QA methodology
  • Working knowledge of issue management tools (e.g. Jira, Trello)
  • Familiarity with Agile frameworks and regression testing is a plus
  • Ability to document and troubleshoot errors
  • Working knowledge of test management software (e.g. qTest, Zephyr) and SQL is a plus
  • Excellent communication skills
  • Attention to detail
  • Analytical mind and problem-solving aptitude
  • Strong organizational skills
  • BSc/BA in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field is a plus

• Microsoft .NET ve C# kullanarak Windows ve ASP.NET MVC Web tabanlı uygulama geliştirme alanında en az 5 yıl deneyim,
  • Windows Desktop Search, API ve PowerShell konularında bilgi sahibi olması,
  • İyi derecede MS-SQL ve Advanced Transact-SQL (T-SQL) bilen,
  • Object Oriented Programming, Parallel Programing, Network Protocol, Data Structures, Solid ve Multithread uygulama geliştirme konularında deneyim sahibi olunması,
  • MSSQL, Oracle ve benzeri ilişkisel veri tabanı ile çalışmış, SQL konusunda tecrübeli, veritabanı modelleme konularına hakim
  • Clean code ve solid prensiplerini uygulayabilen, analiz, planlama ve takip yeteneği gelişmiş,
  • Azure Devops kullanarak proje geliştirmiş,
  • Literatürü takip edebilecek seviyede İngilizce bilgisi olan,
  • İş için istekli, güçlü analiz yapabilen ve problem çözme yeteneğine sahip
  • Öğrenmeye açık,
  • Araştırma yapmaya istek ve arzulu,
  • Gelişimine önem veren,
  • Kendi kendine motive olabilecek,
  • Takım çalışmasına önem veren,

company.name: SiberTime Teknoloji ve Bilgi Güvenliği Hizmetleri

data.description:
Büyümeye devam eden ve Türkiye'den Dünya'ya oyun üreten yabancı ortaklı firmamızda yetiştirilmek üzere, Oyun Teorilerini ve Olasılık-İstatistik Metotlarını, programlama dilleriyle ilişkilendirerek oyun mekanikleri için Matematiksel Modelleme yapacak ve bu modellemeleri kodlayıp çözümleyecek Oyun Matematikçisi adayları aramaktayız.


  • Üniversitelerin ilgili bölümlerinden mezun olmak,
  • Öğrenmeye azimli ve çalışkan,
  • İyi derecede İngilizce bilen,
  • Problem çözme, olasılıklar, algoritma kurma ve analitik düşünme becerisine sahip.

Beyn Bilgi Teknolojileri A.Ş olarak Dünya çapında kullanılan gerçekleştirdiğimiz Front End uygulamalarda tam zamanlı çalışabilecek Web Arayüz Geliştiricisi takım arkadaşları aramaktayız.


  • Sorumluluk sahibi ve takım çalışmasına yatkın,
  • HTML5, JavaScript, CSS3 ve benzeri tarayıcı taraflı kodlama ve uygulamalarında gerekli bilgiye sahip,
  • View Model (Örneğin ; MVC) tabanlı çalışabilecek,
  • Typescript, CoffeeScript kütüphaneler hakkında bilgi sahibi,
  • Object Oriented CSS(OOCSS) konusunda bilgili,

Job description

We are looking for a Senior PHP Developer who is able to work in Istanbul. We build good looking, responsive, cross platform, high performance web applications.


Requirements

  • Minimum of 2 years experience in PHP.
  • Laravel or Symfony framework experience is a must.
  • Familiarity with coding standards (i.e. PSR-1/PSR-2 or PEAR).
  • RESTful API creation and integration.
  • Experience in building fast, high performance database structure and queries.
  • Know-how of Caching, Queues.
  • Good knowledge of Git.
  • Code quality is very important, so you have to be comfortable with PHP CodeSniffer.
  • Comfortable with high level of ownership and responsibility.


Good to Have

  • Bonus point if you have experience with ElasticSearch.
  • Bonus point if you have experience with Google Cloud.
  • Bonus point if you have experience with Docker.


What is the technology stack at Macellan?

  • The team is one of the most experienced in Turkey, dedicated to delivering high quality, beautiful apps.
  • PHP ecosystem (Laravel, Symfony, Composer) and related design patterns.
  • We also use NodeJS in some cases.
  • Relational databases, and ElasticSearch.
  • React Native for mobile development.

We are looking for a motivated Senior Frontend Engineer to develop high quality and usable interfaces.

İş Tanımı

İzmir Bilim ve Teknoloji Parkı Teknoloji Geliştirme Bölgesi'nde bulunan ofisimizde, tam zamanlı olmak üzere çalışma arkadaşları arıyoruz.


Genel Nitelikler

  • En az 1 yıl ReactJs-React Native tecrübesine sahip olmak.
  • Webpack, Npm ve Yarn hakkında bilgi sahibi olmak.
  • Cihaz odaklı UI kulları nedir bilmek.
  • RESTful API oluşturma ve entegre etme konusunda deneyimli olmak.
  • Sketch ve Figma ile yapılan arayüzleri sorunsuz olarak mobile aktarabilmek.
  • Source control için Git kullanmış olmak.
  • BONUS! Google Firebase, Realtime Database deneyimlemiş olmak.
  • BONUS! Geliştirilen uygulamaları, ilgili marketlerde yayınlamış olmak.


Sunulacak İmkanlar

  • Çalışma süresince yemek masraflarınız karşılanacaktır.
  • Haftada 5 gün (Pazartesi-Cuma / 45 saat) çalışıyoruz.
  • Haftanın 4 gününü müşterilerimize 1 gününü (Cuma günü) ise kendimizi geliştirmeye ayırıyoruz.
  • Ofisimizde taze kahve ve farklı lezzetlerde içeceklerimiz mevcuttur.
  • Konuşmacı olarak katılacağınız etkinlik veya konferanslara ait masraflarınızı karşılıyoruz.
  • Organize edeceğimiz etkinliklerde yine konuşmacı ya da etkinlikte farklı görevlerde bulunabilirsiniz.


Başvuru Değerlendirme Süreci

  • Görüşmeler bulunduğumuz lokasyon üzerinden birebir gerçekleşecektir.
  • Görüşmeler sırasında sizden varsa çalışmalarınız için örnekler talep edilecektir.
  • Başvuru için CV ile birlikte çalışmalarınızı göndererek birebir görüşme talebinde bulunabilirsiniz.

Tarfin is looking for passionate back-end PHP developer to be part of its development team in Beyoğlu, Istanbul.


At Tarfin, in addition to a competitive salary and lots of benefits you’ll be working on cutting-edge technology, be exposed to best mentors and reputable Venture Capital firms both in Turkey and overseas.


Why Tarfin?

Tarfin is Turkey’s leading digital platform providing farmers with high quality agri-inputs with with competitive credit terms. Our mission is to use proprietary cutting-edge technology, our extensive funding reach and big data analytics to reduce costs of fertilizers, feed and other farm inputs for farmers in Turkey and abroad.


Tarfin is the most innovative company in its space: We are the first non-financial company to issue an asset-backed security in Turkey, the first digital platform to focus on providing instant credit terms to farmers, first fintech company to partner with Turkey’s Credit Bureau for data sharing in agriculture. Tarfin is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. We are backed by region’s leading venture capital funds and BIC Angels.


How we work?

Tarfin engineering team is developing its projects on separate layers using a docker containerised structure. The backend is on Laravel (5.7) - Php7.2 (restAPI) and the frontend is developed on Vue.js. We’re using Gitlab CI/CD tools while deploying to AWS (ECR, ECS).


We enjoy a strong team culture and support open source development.

We have a very enjoyable office featuring awe-inspiring Bosphorus views.


Requirements

  • 2+ years experience as a back-end developer,
  • Understanding of MVC Architecture, Clean Coding principles and RESTful services,
  • Experience of PHP and PHP frameworks like laravel, symphony
  • Knowledge of MYSQL, Redis, Memcached etc.
  • Knowledge of Git and DevOps concepts (CI/CD)
  • Knowledge of PHPUnit
  • Analytical thinking, ability for problem solving and be open to learning new technologies


Preferred but not required:

  • Experience with AWS and Docker
  • Knowledge of Elasticsearch, RabbitMQ
  • Knowledge of HTML5, CSS3
  • Knowledge of Javascript and proficient around Vue.js


Benefits:

  • Competitive salary
  • Private health
  • Budget for continuing education
  • Meal card

  • BONUS! Google Cloud, Firebase ve AWS üzerine bilgi sahibi olmak.


Sunulacak İmkanlar

Our mission is to use proprietary cutting-edge technology, our extensive funding reach and big data analytics to reduce costs of fertilizers, feed and other farm inputs for farmers in Turkey and abroad.


Tarfin is the most innovative company in its space: We are the first non-financial company to issue an asset-backed security in Turkey, the first digital platform to focus on providing instant credit terms to farmers, first fintech company to partner with Turkey’s Credit Bureau for data sharing in agriculture. Tarfin is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. We are backed by region’s leading venture capital funds and BIC Angels.


How we work?

Tarfin engineering team is developing its projects on separate layers using a docker containerised structure. The backend is on Laravel (5.7) - Php 7.2 (restAPI) and the frontend is developed on Vue.js. We’re using Gitlab CI/CD tools while deploying to AWS (ECR, ECS).


We enjoy a strong team culture and support open source development.

We have a very enjoyable office featuring awe-inspiring Bosphorus views.


Requirements:

  • 2+ years experience as a front-end developer,
  • Knowledge of JavaScript with ES6
  • Experience with at least one JavaScript framework like Vue.js, React.js, Angular
  • Experience with HTML5 and CSS3
  • Experience with front-end dev-ops (npm, yarn, webpack, gulp, babel)
  • Experience with sass-less
  • Experience in responsive web design
  • Knowledge of Git
  • Ability to write clean code


Preferred but not required:

  • Knowledge of UX and design
  • Knowledge for DevOps concepts (CI/CD)
  • Knowledge of React Native
  • Knowledge of PHP and PHP frameworks like laravel, symphony.


Benefits:

  • Competitive salary
  • Private health
  • Budget for continuing education
  • Meal card

We are using Laravel as our backend technology and PostgreSQL as our database hero, Angular for the frontend framework and LESS for the CSS pre-processing technology. Frontend and Backend are separate applications and live in separate Git repos. Our development environment is based on Docker.

Keywords: Laravel, PHP, SQL-ish, Git, Internet


Requirements

- Any web programming language experiences are welcome (Python, Ruby, NodeJS etc.)

- PHP and Laravel experience is a very big cat

- Knowledge of SQL database especially PostgreSQL is a plus but we are using Eloquent ORM so you will never see an actual SQL query

- Turkish and English is a must since our code base is in English and interface is both in Turkish and English

- I think that’s all folks


Benefits

- Competitive salary

- Premium private health insurance

- Food card

- Dream team and cool office

Dugun.com is one of the fastest growing internet companies in Turkey and the 3rd biggest Online Wedding Website globally. Besides Turkey, Dugun.com exists in 14 different countries both in MENA and Europe and is ready to expand to more countries.


With its continued success, friendly work environment and company culture, Dugun.com is looking for new members to its expand its IT team in Izmir and Istanbul

Insider Growth Management Platform (GMP) helps digital marketers drive growth across the funnel, from Acquisition to Activation, Retention, and Revenue. Our engineers and developers are constantly harnessing the full force of the digital world to make a great impact, nurturing their work with innovation and shipping like artists to create beautiful and smart products. Do you want to work with an International team to be part of a team that inspires and challenges the technology?

 

If yes, then join our team as a Senior Front-end Developer and actively shape the future of the technology world.


Our Engineering Culture:

Our team believes collaboration and fast iteration.

We work in small agile groups to solve sophisticated and high impact problems.

We work closely with other engineer teams and don’t afraid to get our hands dirty with other areas if needed.

We don’t wait for jobs, we create them. Because in a startup, nothing happens by itself. Not unless we make it.

  • Experience with Sass or other compiled CSS languages,
  • Experience in responsive web design,
  • Develop and test across multiple browsers, platforms, and devices, including smartphones and tablets,

  • Stay up-to-date on emerging technologies,
  • Good knowledge of version control systems e.g. Git,
  • Experience in optimizing for page performance,
  • Ability to write clean and semantical front-end code,
  • Self-motivated; independent, organized and proactive; highly responsive, flexible, and adaptable when working across multiple teams,
  • Should be open for developing and learning new technologies.


Bonuses(as a plus):

  • Experience with MongoDB,
  • Experience with AWS (deploy and monitoring of app).

Our engineers and developers are constantly harnessing the full force of the digital world to make a great impact, nurturing their work with innovation and shipping like artists to create beautiful and smart products. The product development and the technical team is located in Istanbul. Currently, we are running 120+ servers on an average, 75 Million requests, and sending 200 Million push notifications per day. In predictive we have accomplished to capture more than 50TB of historical data. We also successfully reached 25% of the global population.


Okay… now you’re thinking, what do we expect from you?


  • Passion. Preferably a truck-load of it! Okay, jokes apart, we are looking for the perfect fit, someone who’s got the skills, experience, passion and a thirst for learning. And we go the extra mile to find it, searching high and low, far and wide. Now you know how we made offices in 19 regions. Or in more technical terms, here’s what we are after-
  • A university graduate in computer engineering or related department. The graduate degree should be a 4 year course.
  • At least 2 years experience in internet and web applications
  • A PHP expert who is familiar with Laravel framework
  • Someone who has knowledge of MYSQL and has worked around Elasticsearch and/or NoSQL technologies
  • Adept at using at least one of software code tools (SVN, CVS, Git etc)
  • Proficient around Vue.js
  • A personality that’s comfortable taking ownership of tasks and in operating within a team environment
  • Analytical thinking, a love for problem solving and open to learning new technologies

So… you’re wondering what is this role about?

  • We are on the hunt! The hunt for A-players who love solving problems, geeks who don’t blindly accept the status-quo but instead come up with impactful efficiencies and minds that get a kick from building world-class products simply because that is the purpose of their existence. We are looking for the elusive, the rare, the megalodons of the tech world. If you feel like we are describing you, read on.
  • We also realize that most Job Descriptions almost always sound like the description an A-380 but when you’ve arrived at the airport what you find is a Cessna twin seater! We want to write a JD that’s realistic and as close to the real thing as possible. How can we do this?
  • So, we thought about it and realized, what better way to explain a role than to have it straight from where the action takes place? Which is why we asked our PHP development team to tell us about the ecosystem and this is what they had to share…
  • We translate the company’s goals and visions into functioning and high performing tools
  • We create and implement a wide variety of web-based products using PHP
  • We work as a family more than a team, to develop complex web-based applications
  • We develop and maintain our website and web applications
  • We coordinate with co-developers and other related departments to ensure maximum efficiency and arrive at world-class results
  • We send regular updates about project status to concerned stakeholders
  • We understand, evaluate and take on tasks based on resolution priority and the greater company vision/goals

Alright.. so now you’re contemplating, what’s in it for me?

  • Food Food and more FOOD!! Healthy lunches, dinners and afternoon snacks. Plus coffee and tea are always handy!
  • Upgrade, improve and challenge yourself with the many soft skills training that we offer. You’ll have access to Udemy’s business plan, where you can choose over 10,000 courses to satisfy your hunger for knowledge.
  • You’ll have space to share your skills and even deliver training and workshops if you wish. Sharing is caring!
  • We’ll provide you with a paid Spotify account subscription, how do you fancy working to the beats of your favourite audio while blocking out the rest of the world?
  • You’ll have a chance to work in an international, diverse and inclusive environment
  • You’ll be part of an industry that’s shaping the future of customer experiences. Still not sure? Just ask Google.
  • Occasional TGIF happy hours!

Was this position made for you?

[Let’s chat]

We’re looking for a Senior Software Quality Assurance Engineer who will help our team of test engineers design and develop robust automation systems to ensure product quality.


At Insider, our code is to change the way digital experiences are built and improved by democratizing predictive, machine learning and AI technologies. You will be working in a multi-functional agile squad of brilliant people including developers, data scientists, business intelligence analysts and product managers in a fast-paced, high-tech and collaborative environment. Join our QA Team to create your own playground give product engineers the confidence critical to the successful release of Insider’s products.

What you will do day in and day out

  • Assist creating and designing the architecture of a robust automation system
  • Monitor every phase of the software development lifecycle to ensure product quality and timely delivery
  • Estimate the testing process and develop testing strategies
  • Attend regular customer meetings (internal) and discuss the weekly status with the project leadership team
  • Work collaboratively across departments supporting infrastructure, implementation, and ongoing improvements to our automation framework
  • Arrange the hardware and software requirements for the test setup and ensure the quality of content and structure of all testing documents
  • Review the QA artifacts and reports prepared by QA engineers
  • Identify and manage risks proactively
  • Develop testing strategies and track new requirements for the projects
  • Shape the growth of the existing team while cultivating a culture of constant learning

What we expect from you

  • Passionate about product quality
  • Brilliant in your delivery of technical solutions
  • Pragmatic about what is best both technically and for the business
  • Energetic and versatile in a dynamic work environment
  • Knowledgeable in web and mobile web applications
  • Clear, professional and diplomatic in communication
  • Efficient when working independently
  • Distinguishable when working on a team

What you need to have

  • You have at least 3 years of experience in Quality Assurance
  • You have a deep understanding of modern automated testing tools, frameworks, and processes
  • You know your way around software testing process and methods like ISEB/ISTQB/TMAP
  • You have hands-on experience with tools like Selenium, Appium, Locust, and Jenkins
  • You are comfortable with the tools, concepts and methodologies of QA and Web Development
  • You have solid experience with Python or Java
  • You have in-depth knowledge of the Agile Testing Process
  • You are a true problem solver and a curious bug when it comes to product quality
  • You are a proactive and self-directed person, you take initiatives when necessary
  • You are committed to increasing efficiency by continuously automating parts of the software testing engineering process


What is it like to work at Insider?

  • Are you a true seeker of personal development?
  • Are you ready to go the extra mile to create an impact?
  • Do you want to be challenged with engaging work every day, pushing your boundaries?
  • Do you want to be surrounded by dedicated and passionate people who care about each other and the world we live in?
  • If all of your answers are yes, then you are in the right place. We are underdogs, game-changers, data-junkies; we overcome challenges through hard work and innovation. You will work with some of the world’s most brilliant and passionate engineers together to solve challenging problems.


Did someone say perks? Yup

-Stock option program

-On-going educational sessions and training (including Sales, Digital Marketing, Customer Success, Entrepreneurship, Google Analytics, tech talks)

-Free access to premium services like Udemy, Blinkist, Masterclass and Spotify

-4 Meals a day & snacks in between, you even get your 3 pm healthy snack delivered to your desk every day

-No-dress code

-Lots - and we mean lots - of coffee machines

Insider simplifies the life of digital marketers and helps them drive growth for their brands, with zero marketing waste.


We are looking for a Product UX/UI Designer, who will strive to bring brands and experiences to life using a multifaceted digital approach.


Skills & Requirements:

  • 3+ years of experience in UI and UX design
  • Enthusiastic to solve user problems
  • Able to create icons, design guidelines and solve problems with creativity
  • Good visual skills and understanding current design trends
  • Aware of the terms User Centered Design, Responsive Design and Mobile First
  • Able to make B2B products beautiful. (they absolutely can be)
  • Proficient with Sketch, Photoshop, Marvel, Invision or similar design tools
  • Demonstrate UI skills with strong portfolio!
  • Most important; show an eagerness to grow and learn more about the business. This includes asking questions, reading and being open and responsive to feedback/areas of improvement.

Job Description

  • Able to transform low-fidelity wireframes into beautiful, high-fidelity user interfaces across a diverse range of platforms, including smartphones and tablets;
  • Creating animations and motions for designs;
  • Develop efficient solutions to user interface problems in iPhone, Android, Mac, and the Web;
  • Actively participate in design and requirement sessions with a range of internal parties;
  • Communicate frequently with clients, providing updates and guidance as needed;
  • Working closely with UX Designers, Product Managers and Developers;
  • Able to create visual designs according to companys style guide;
  • Able to collaborate to expand companys style guide;
  • Provide and accept creative feedback from fellow team members;
  • Stay up to date on current and best UI design practices and industry standards;
  • Refinement of deliverable standards and work to a fixed timetable.

All the applications without portfolio will not be evaluated.


Insider is a technology company with offices in London, Singapore, Tokyo, Hong Kong, Seoul, Sydney, Helsinki, Barcelona, Dubai, Moscow, Warsaw, Taipei, Jakarta, Istanbul, Kiev, Ho Chi Minh City, Bangkok, Ankara and Kuala Lumpur. Insider was listed as one of Europe’s 100 Hottest Startups by WIRED Magazine and won Red Herring Top 100 Europe in 2017. CrunchBase has recently ranked Insider’s co-founder and CEO Hande Cilingir as one of the top three women CEOs outside of the US.


Some of the most prestigious Fortune 500 companies and top brands in retail, automotive and travel across the globe use Insider to deliver AI-backed personalized experiences. Helping world’s leading brands grow beyond the speed of customer expectations, Insider is trusted by over 400 businesses across various industries including UNIQLO, Singapore Airlines, Tokopedia, Virgin, New Balance, Nissan, Huawei, Samsung, Puma, Newsweek, Media Markt, AVIS, Allianz, BBVA, Dominos, McDonald’s, Avon and CNN.


Insider is a value-driven company and we provide equal opportunity in a zero-discrimination workplace. Insider not just welcomes but also embraces diversity. Therefore, all qualified candidates will be considered without regards to sex, race, color, nationality, religion, gender identity, sexual orientation, disability status, citizenship or marital status. Lastly, Insider will provide all necessary arrangements for eligible individuals with disabilities.

Our Engineering Culture:

  • Our team believes collaboration and fast iteration
  • We work in small agile groups to solve sophisticated and high impact problems
  • We work closely with other engineer teams and dont afraid to get our hands dirty with other areas if needed
  • We dont wait for jobs, we create them. Because in a startup, nothing happens by itself. Not unless we make it

Requirements

  • Understand and follow Insider's testing processes and responsibilities
  • Participate in executing manual and automation test scripts
  • Record the result (pass/fail)
  • Record any new defects uncovered during the test execution
  • Provide comments on any defects that are discovered during testing
  • Retest as necessary
  • Participate in User Acceptance Testing, report issues and test results as required
  • Checking for timely delivery of issues, etc.
  • Arranging the hardware and software requirements for the test setup
  • Estimating the testing process
  • Developing the testing strategies
  • Communicating and working with business owners to write and implement
  • Related test plans
  • Maintain required QA systems
  • Work to improve Quality of the product, systems, processes
  • Creating solutions to problems


What you need to be:

- Clear, professional and diplomatic in communication

- Be able to work with an agile mindset, fast to adapt to constant changes and be comfortable with it

- Know how to prioritize his work, should be flexible about sudden changes in the game plan and when to stick to it

- Should be passionate for self improvement and experiment with different ways of working

- Distinguishable when working on a team


What you need to have:


- Having some work experience in software development and some testing experience over a complex product

- Preferably have knowledge about software testing process and methods like ISEB/ISTQB/TMAP

- Preferably have knowledge about software tools that are used in automation of functional testing like Selenium, Appium, Locust, Jenkins

- Knowledge in Python

Our engineers and developers are constantly harnessing the full force of the digital world to make a great impact, nurturing their work with innovation and shipping like artists to create beautiful and smart products. The product development and the technical team is located in Istanbul. Currently, we are running 120+ servers on an average, 75 Million requests, and sending 200 Million push notifications per day. In predictive we have accomplished to capture more than 50TB of historical data. We also successfully reached 25% of the global population.


  • Are you ready to make a better world with data science?
  • Are you getting really excited with the idea of taking Web to the next level with web personallisation?
  • Are you passionate about developing predictive models on the top of billions of online user behaviors?
  • Do you think that you can find the balance of research and development in a fast growing startup?
  • Are you enthusiastic about artificial intelligence and eager to learn every single innovation in this subject?


If you answered yes, then the INSIDER is looking for you!


Our Engineering Culture:

  • Our team believes collaboration and fast iteration.
  • We work in small agile groups to solve sophisticated and high impact problems.
  • We work closely with other engineer teams and don’t afraid to get our hands dirty with other areas if needed.
  • We don’t wait for jobs, we create them. Because in a startup, nothing happens by itself. Not unless we make it.

Skills and Requirements

  • Proficiency in Scala, Python or Java
  • Hands on Experience with Big Data technologies (like Apache Spark, Hadoop, MapReduce)
  • Good knowledge of Machine Learning (Supervised and Unsupervised) and Statistical methods
  • Knowledge of Big Data architectures such as Lambda Architecture
  • Experience in Machine Learning frameworks such as MLlib, TensorFlow, Mahout, Scikit-learn, H2O, Prediction.IO
  • Self-motivated; independent, organized and proactive; highly responsive, flexible, and adaptable when working across multiple teams.
  • Strong SQL skills.
  • Experience with recommendation systems is preferred.
  • Experience with AWS or other cloud services is favorable.
  • PhD is a plus.
  • Experience in NoSQL databases (HBase, Cassandra or ElasticSearch)

Job Description:


With Insider you will be able to see your outcome of work in an instant. You have the opportunity to work with new technologies and with websites that have high volume traffic and are the top websites in their verticals and regions. Your work will affect millions of people to buy, click ad and register. During your subway ride you will see people you don’t know but you will know that you have created an impact on their behavior and life. 

 

·You will work with JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS, basic PHP specifications to develop or adapt software issues.

-You will use best practices and knowledge of internal or external business processes to improve services and solve long-term problems

-You will get feedback from, and build solutions for, other technical departments.

-You will be responsible for development and help our technical support team.

-You will work with a team of computer engineers and review each other’s codes.

Requirements

  • Should be a 4 year University graduate or 2 year Associate Diploma Holder - (Computer Engineering or related departments are preferred);
  • Should have knowledge of JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS and other internet technologies;
  • Should be good at team work and taking responsibilities;
  • Should have enough English fluency and proficiency to analyze technical documents;
  • Preferably, should have worked on project with PHP;
  • Having knowledge of SQL is preferred;
  • Must have analytical thinking, problem solving and system developing skills;
  • Being open for learning, developing and learning new technologies is preferred

  • The person, who takes this position, will be based in our Istanbul Office and work as an iOS Developer for our Istanbul office. 


Job Description:

  • Handling a portion of the most difficult issues in mobile
  • Utilizing the most ideally equipped instruments for the job
  • Routinely attending weekly meetings
  • You will have to to think outside of the box, where there is no more comfort zone for you as an application owner

Skills & Requirements:

  • BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
  • Min 2 years working experience in iOS development
  • Understanding of Apple^iOS design principles and interface guidelines
  • Experience in working with iOS frameworks
  • Knowledge of OO design and programming skills in Objective-C
  • Knowledge of Xcode and iOS SDK
  • Experience in web service integration (REST, JSON)
  • Knowledge of cloud message APIs and push notification is plus
  • Experience in using analytics integration using a 3rd party software is plus
  • Deep understanding of the full mobile development life cycle
  • Desire to become a full-stack developer
  • Preferable have a hybrid platform development
  • Good command of written and spoken English
